story:
You need AXLL Classic-17

During walking, foot bears force about 1~1.5 times from body weight. The force rushes into about 3~4 times while running.  At the same time, foot takes responsibility of propelling your body moving forward.  After a long period of working foot, it easily brings in foot fatigue, joint instability, and plantar fasciitis, etc.  To reduce the discomforts above, wearing a right pair of insoles is necessary.

AXLL Classic-17 will reduce the heel strike to ground at the first moment, and effectively average the pressure to foot.  It will keep foot arch properly supported, and steady the ankle joint during walking or running.  The efficient energy feedback will also be available to ease muscular fatigue on legs.  You will feel comfortable on your feet and legs longer time.

Standing & Walking Posture Maintenance

The AXLL Classic-17 is characteristic of its special carbon fiber material, which provides energy storage and return, and controls the body posture during the gait cycle at the same time.  Also, it reduces the calf muscle fatigue and enables human to walk and stand longer time.

Patented Four-Arch Support Design

Our exclusive four-arch design is featured of three main characters to keep your foot at long-term comfort: First, supporting your arch stably to redistribute plantar pressure.  Second, maintaining your ankle joint stably to prevent from the over-pronation and over-supination.  Third, providing energy storage and energy return to enhance foot propulsion force.

Heel Cup  & Heel Hole Design

With the ultra unique heel hole and heel cup design, the Classic-17 absorbs the shock to your foot and properly supports the foot.  It also keeps your subtalar joint mobilization balance.

Aerospace Grade Carbon Fiber

In the market, insoles are generally made from foam material with insufficient rigidity, which is incapable of keeping footbones steady.  To innovate the traditional insoles, the AXLL Classic-17 uses the carbon fiber material, which has special nature of stiffness, flexibility, and durability simultaneously.  Also, the carbon fiber is up to 7,000 times more rigid than foam. That‘s why the Classic-17 keeps your foot stable for a longer time.

¾ Length Design:
All shoes with one Classic-17 only

Replaces any other insoles

No Need of Removing Original Insoles

Thanks to Classic-17 ultra-slim design, putting it on top of your existing insole is easy.

Totally WaterProof

AXLL Classic-17 should be cleaned with the neutral pH detergent.  After water cleaning, use the soft towel to wipe it dry.

Specification

The lightest and thinnest worldwide.

 

Mechanics & Aesthetics

We at AXLL stick to each part of the Classic-17.

How to choose your size?

REMARKS

  • If your foot length is between the sizes in the table, please choose the smaller size to fit your foot. (e.g. As a male, your foot length is 26.7cm, which is between the sizes M and L.  Please choose size M as your best one.)
  • If you cannot find your size in the table, please feel free to let us know.

Product Validation

The medial arch of insole plays the most important role of supporting body weight and providing energy return.  At the mid-stance phase, the position of the medial arch on insole must have excellent rigidity character to effectively support the arch and distribute the pressure.  When toe off, an insole should provide sufficient rebound strength to reduce the calf muscle fatigue, and achieve a longer standing and walking effect.

Therefore, we carried out the mechanic test on the medial arch design of the Classic-17.  After push-down test, it does meet all the requirement above.  The AXLL Classic-17 is definitely the best insole for you.

 

Never Give Up Any Detail

The Classic-17 goes through the strict producing procedure and quality control procedure.  We pay highly attention to each detail, from product to package.  All AXLL sticks to is provide the best Classic-17 to you.

 

Click the sharing buttons, and tag your friends & families.

 

Our story

AXLL is a small group.  We teamed up by enthusiastic professionals. 

We are majored in the area of the Biomedical Engineering, the Material Engineering, the Clinic Analysis & Validation, and the Industrial Design.  We have been devoting ourselves to the development of the most professional, considerate, and humanized orthotic products for years.

Our team members have rich working experiences in the foot medical system.  We have found that most of people would neglect the importance of foot health care.  They generally mistake the discomfort of foot, leg, waist, or back for the result of standing or walking too much.  However, the fact is that their foot arches aren’t effectively supported by the insoles.  Throughout the global market, we had tried various existing arch insoles, but only problems were found: no pair of insoles provides with rigid-enough material and coherent shape to human’s foot arch simultaneously.  That is, our body discomfort is impossible to be soothed correctly with current insoles in the market.  Therefore, we at AXLL have spent two years developing and designing the ergonomic arch insole to human’s foot.  In the same time, we have found and use the special carbon fiber material full of rigidity, tenacity, and flexibility.  After product validation, the revolutionary Classic-17 is born finally.

Now, we need your support to complete the following mass production.  Let’s introduce the most revolutionary Classic-17, full carbon fiber insole, to the world.  Let’s experience the brand-new improvement of standing and walking per gait.  Step our own lives!

 

 

FAQ

1. Will the Classic-17 be cracked itself?

Ans: The Classic-17 is made from the material of carbon fiber, which is characteristic of both rigidity and tenacity.  The material is at the same carbon fiber level as for Formula 1 & Airbus A380.  Without any artificial damage or misuse, it should not be cracked.

2. The Classic-17 looks solid.  Will it be painful for my foot?

Ans: The Classic-17 is featured of its distinctive patented 4-arch design and its particular heel cup and heel hole, which are designed with human’s average foot curvature data.  Accordingly, wearing the Classic-17, your feet will be supported comfortably without any pain or pressure to your foot.  Moreover, the structure of the Classic-17 is designed similarly to the spring.  You’ll feel the rebound from the foot bottom to enhance the propulsion and save walking power per your step.

3. Can I wear the Classic-17 if my foot has often been painful?

Ans: It should be depended on the painful factors of your foot.  If the pain is resulted from the long period of standing or walking, the Classic-17 will be your best choice.  The Classic-17 will distribute the foot pressure evenly, and enhance the foot propulsion to enable you walk and stand longer time.  Otherwise, if your foot pain is resulted from the unknown factors, like foot pathology or car accident, etc., please see the doctor for advice in advance.

4. What kind of shoes can I fit the Classic-17 into?

Ans:  The Classic-17 is featured with the 3/4 length design.  Most of the shoes can be applied with the Classic-17.  To make it more comfortable, please wear the shoes at proper size coherent to your feet.  And, please avoid the factors below:

  • Too much bigger or smaller size of shoes
  • Too much or less extra space inside the shoes
  • Too much tight or loose lacing method of shoes

5. How can I clean the Classic-17?

Ans: You can use the running water for cleaning, and wipe it dry with the soft towel.  It is very easy to keep it clean.

6. What can I do if I receive the defective goods?

Ans: Each Classic-17 will go through the strict quality control during mass production and before shipment.  We provide one time of replacing if required.  Please see the detail in our important claim below.

 

Important Claim

1.The Classic-17 has already been developed by AXLL for almost two years, and it is on the final procedure.  Now, AXLL needs your contributions to have this brand new item into the mass production.  With your kind favor, we are confident that it will be the best insole for shoes in the world.  We make sure that once the campaign succeeds, we’ll carry out the producing soonest.

2.AXLL has the close communication with our factory now to ensure the estimated delivery date.  However, once the quantity is too much more than our production capacity, or something unexpected, we’ll keep you posted with the latest information soonest to let you know the updated delivery date.

3.AXLL would not provide any returning service.

4.AXLL provides the exchange service for one time only.

5.In case you have any item exchanging need, such as defective product (not- artificial factor damage), please keep AXLL group in touch in 14 days after receiving the goods：
If the product exchange is approved by AXLL, we’ll inform you the following exchanging procedure with the shipping document.

  • Please put your Classic-17 back into the original package, and provide it together with the shipping document to your carrier express.  Afterwards, send it back to the receiver information below:
  1. Receiver: ADDS DESIGN Co., Ltd.
  2. Address: Rm. 2, 15F., No.530, Yingcai Rd., West Dist., Taichung City 403, Taiwan (R.O.C.)  
  3. TEL: +886-4-23027656
  4. FAX:  +886-4-23027651
  • Please note that you‘ll be responsible for the shipping cost to AXLL group (including the special shipment cost in your country, customs fee, process fee, etc. if available); AXLL will be responsible for the delivery fee back to you.

6.Also, if you have anything further, kindly feel free to let us know.  We’ll reply you soonest as we can.

7.If you cannot find your country from the perk shipping locations, please contact AXLL.
story_txt:
You need AXLL Classic-17During walking, foot bears force about 1~1.5 times from body weight. The force rushes into about 3~4 times while running.  At the same time, foot takes responsibility of propelling your body moving forward.  After a long period of working foot, it easily brings in foot fatigue, joint instability, and plantar fasciitis, etc.  To reduce the discomforts above, wearing a right pair of insoles is necessary.AXLL Classic-17 will reduce the heel strike to ground at the first moment, and effectively average the pressure to foot.  It will keep foot arch properly supported, and steady the ankle joint during walking or running.  The efficient energy feedback will also be available to ease muscular fatigue on legs.  You will feel comfortable on your feet and legs longer time.Standing & Walking Posture MaintenanceThe AXLL Classic-17 is characteristic of its special carbon fiber material, which provides energy storage and return, and controls the body posture during the gait cycle at the same time.  Also, it reduces the calf muscle fatigue and enables human to walk and stand longer time.Patented Four-Arch Support DesignOur exclusive four-arch design is featured of three main characters to keep your foot at long-term comfort: First, supporting your arch stably to redistribute plantar pressure.  Second, maintaining your ankle joint stably to prevent from the over-pronation and over-supination.  Third, providing energy storage and energy return to enhance foot propulsion force.Heel Cup  & Heel Hole DesignWith the ultra unique heel hole and heel cup design, the Classic-17 absorbs the shock to your foot and properly supports the foot.  It also keeps your subtalar joint mobilization balance.Aerospace Grade Carbon FiberIn the market, insoles are generally made from foam material with insufficient rigidity, which is incapable of keeping footbones steady.  To innovate the traditional insoles, the AXLL Classic-17 uses the carbon fiber material, which has special nature of stiffness, flexibility, and durability simultaneously.  Also, the carbon fiber is up to 7,000 times more rigid than foam. That‘s why the Classic-17 keeps your foot stable for a longer time.¾ Length Design:All shoes with one Classic-17 onlyReplaces any other insoles
No Need of Removing Original InsolesThanks to Classic-17 ultra-slim design, putting it on top of your existing insole is easy.Totally WaterProofAXLL Classic-17 should be cleaned with the neutral pH detergent.  After water cleaning, use the soft towel to wipe it dry.SpecificationThe lightest and thinnest worldwide. Mechanics & AestheticsWe at AXLL stick to each part of the Classic-17.How to choose your size?REMARKS
If your foot length is between the sizes in the table, please choose the smaller size to fit your foot. (e.g. As a male, your foot length is 26.7cm, which is between the sizes M and L.  Please choose size M as your best one.)
If you cannot find your size in the table, please feel free to let us know.
Product ValidationThe medial arch of insole plays the most important role of supporting body weight and providing energy return.  At the mid-stance phase, the position of the medial arch on insole must have excellent rigidity character to effectively support the arch and distribute the pressure.  When toe off, an insole should provide sufficient rebound strength to reduce the calf muscle fatigue, and achieve a longer standing and walking effect.Therefore, we carried out the mechanic test on the medial arch design of the Classic-17.  After push-down test, it does meet all the requirement above.  The AXLL Classic-17 is definitely the best insole for you. Never Give Up Any DetailThe Classic-17 goes through the strict producing procedure and quality control procedure.  We pay highly attention to each detail, from product to package.  All AXLL sticks to is provide the best Classic-17 to you. Click the sharing buttons, and tag your friends & families. Our storyAXLL is a small group.  We teamed up by enthusiastic professionals. We are majored in the area of the Biomedical Engineering, the Material Engineering, the Clinic Analysis & Validation, and the Industrial Design.  We have been devoting ourselves to the development of the most professional, considerate, and humanized orthotic products for years.Our team members have rich working experiences in the foot medical system.  We have found that most of people would neglect the importance of foot health care.  They generally mistake the discomfort of foot, leg, waist, or back for the result of standing or walking too much.  However, the fact is that their foot arches aren’t effectively supported by the insoles.  Throughout the global market, we had tried various existing arch insoles, but only problems were found: no pair of insoles provides with rigid-enough material and coherent shape to human’s foot arch simultaneously.  That is, our body discomfort is impossible to be soothed correctly with current insoles in the market.  Therefore, we at AXLL have spent two years developing and designing the ergonomic arch insole to human’s foot.  In the same time, we have found and use the special carbon fiber material full of rigidity, tenacity, and flexibility.  After product validation, the revolutionary Classic-17 is born finally.Now, we need your support to complete the following mass production.  Let’s introduce the most revolutionary Classic-17, full carbon fiber insole, to the world.  Let’s experience the brand-new improvement of standing and walking per gait.  Step our own lives!  FAQ1. Will the Classic-17 be cracked itself?Ans: The Classic-17 is made from the material of carbon fiber, which is characteristic of both rigidity and tenacity.  The material is at the same carbon fiber level as for Formula 1 & Airbus A380.  Without any artificial damage or misuse, it should not be cracked.2. The Classic-17 looks solid.  Will it be painful for my foot?Ans: The Classic-17 is featured of its distinctive patented 4-arch design and its particular heel cup and heel hole, which are designed with human’s average foot curvature data.  Accordingly, wearing the Classic-17, your feet will be supported comfortably without any pain or pressure to your foot.  Moreover, the structure of the Classic-17 is designed similarly to the spring.  You’ll feel the rebound from the foot bottom to enhance the propulsion and save walking power per your step.3. Can I wear the Classic-17 if my foot has often been painful?Ans: It should be depended on the painful factors of your foot.  If the pain is resulted from the long period of standing or walking, the Classic-17 will be your best choice.  The Classic-17 will distribute the foot pressure evenly, and enhance the foot propulsion to enable you walk and stand longer time.  Otherwise, if your foot pain is resulted from the unknown factors, like foot pathology or car accident, etc., please see the doctor for advice in advance.4. What kind of shoes can I fit the Classic-17 into?Ans:  The Classic-17 is featured with the 3/4 length design.  Most of the shoes can be applied with the Classic-17.  To make it more comfortable, please wear the shoes at proper size coherent to your feet.  And, please avoid the factors below:
Too much bigger or smaller size of shoes
Too much or less extra space inside the shoes
Too much tight or loose lacing method of shoes
5. How can I clean the Classic-17?Ans: You can use the running water for cleaning, and wipe it dry with the soft towel.  It is very easy to keep it clean.6. story:
Resistance bands are used by millions of people each day to strengthen muscles, burn fat, and rehabilitate tendons and joints. We have taken resistance bands, and all their benefits, and stitched them into comfortable, moisture-wicking athletic pants to create a product that will reshape your health, fitness, and performance.

 Leave the cords, clips, sleds, and straps behind. With 8 resistance bands stitched inside, AGOGIE adds constant tension to every movement, quickly warming your muscles and challenging you in new ways no matter where you are. No setup required.

Think about it as adding gravity to every motion rather than adding weight.

 

With the pants on, you are constantly working to keep the resistance bands stretched out.

After 5-10 minutes, your leg muscles will begin to warm and your core body temperature will rise.

With this constant resistance, your muscles have to work harder to do the same tasks. Your tendons and ligaments have to work at all times to stabilize this extra workload.  THE CONSTANT RESISTANCE FINDS YOUR WEAK AREAS AND FORCES THEM TO BECOME STRONGER.

Once you have the pants on, the resistance feels like it goes away. Don’t be fooled. It hasn’t gone anywhere! Once you take them off, you will feel lighter on your feet and have a spring in your step.

 

 

Comfortable enough for all-day wear, the breathable, moisture-wicking fabric allows the resistance bands to stretch out and comfortably move with your body, while the resistance bands are positioned to mimic natural muscle and ligament lines.

Join the community, and let’s revolutionize fitness together.

Our mission is to make it simple for individuals to live healthy, active lives, where life happens. We believe people should spend more time doing what they love, with who they love, without compromising their health, quality of life or joy of life.

The AGOGIE community is connected by something more than a product. It can’t be seen, or heard, or even categorized. It's a feeling that lives inside each and every one of us and propels us to take on the world. By backing our campaign, you are joining a community of people who are driven by a desire to grow as individuals, by a will to become great.

 


The original idea of ‘resistance pants’ came from where all great ideas are born, the shower. After watching NFL players and their trainer use home-made resistance training tools, Aaron Mottern, AGOGIE’s founder, designer and CEO, had a random idea of putting rubber bands into pants. 

AGOGIE delivers high performance, technically innovative resistance wearable equipment to competitive athletes and individual consumers. The AGOGIE product lines have been tested by professional athletes, performance trainers, and everyday individuals to create a product that will reshape your health, fitness, and performance.

story:
Smart. Sustainable. Ready for the Future.

Designed for those who are always on the go, the NST 2.0 Face Mask has got you covered with its innovative design and high-tech features. It’s a smart mask that communicates with your smartphone through an app, which we’ll talk about more below.

 

Made for Everyday Wear

Our premium mask is made from eco-friendly stretch fabric that ensures comfortability throughout the day, whether you’re running errands or going out for a long drive. It features a flexible nose bridge that has a secure fit to prevent glasses from fogging and adjustable ear straps to lower stress points behind your ears.

 

Sporty and Sleek Design

Not one to disregard aesthetic, we made sure that our mask is versatile enough to suit your style. We went with a design that’s timeless and sophisticated yet casual at the same time. You can definitely wear it to a business meeting or sports event.

Nanotechnology Courtesy of Snapguard 360

The NST 2.0 Face Mask uses a non-toxic nano-coating that provides second water- and moisture-repellant skin on the fabric.

Built-In BFE and VE Filtration Layer

Underneath the waterproof fabric is another layer made of the ultra-soft modal lining that prevents you from having any breathing difficulties. Our face mask also comes with a pocket for PM2.5 filter inserts to give you the extra protection you need.

 Near-Field Communication App Integration

What truly makes the NST 2.0 Face Mask a smart mask is its ability to connect to and communicate with your smartphone. Utilizing NFC technology, users can create a custom profile on the Marwin x Berify app for each NST 2.0 mask you own. You can also set reminders for changing your filter in real-time.

  • A smart mask that communicates with your smartphone using our Marwin x Berify app (iOS and Android)
  •  Marwin x Berify - utilizes near-field communication (NFC) technology to create a custom profile for each mask you own
  •  Marwin x Berify - allows you to set custom timers and reminders for when to change the filter on the masks

  • Mask Profile – You can choose to rearrange the order of your masks in the app depending on how many you have.
  •  Filter Strength – The app updates you with your mask’s filter strength as you go about your day. It will alert you in advance if it’s time to change your filter.
  •  Tutorials – Users can watch a step-by-step tutorial on how to replace their filters.

Summary of the Premium Multi-layer Smart Mask

  • The mask is reusable and more durable and eco-friendly than a surgical mask
  • Replaceable PM2.5 filter in the Smart mask for added filtration (Level 2 ASTM included if stretch goal met)
  • The adjustable nose bridge and ear straps enable the mask to mold better to the users’ face. Also has an adjustable relief band to connect ear straps and lower stress points behind the ears.
  • Stretch fabric provides comfort, moisture-wicking with high airflow, and breathability while still filtering the negative contaminants.

Risks and challenges

We are nearly finished with sourcing new eco-friendly materials, have a new factory in Los Angeles ready and eager to start manufacturing. Our Marwin x Berify app is in beta testing for both android and apple IOS phones. We hope you join us in bringing the Smart Mask to market as soon as possible!

Reusability and recyclability

Our mask is reusable and washable to keep throw-away masks out of landfills.

Sustainable materials

We will use recycled materials for the majority of the mask components.

story:
PRESS

 

THE EVA CUSHION TURNS ANY SURFACE INTO AN ERGONOMIC, COMFORTABLE SEAT!

EVA Cushion - Make Any Seating Surfaces Ergonomic!

  • Help lower back posture and relieve back pain, tailbone, and other back issues
  • With waterproof and moisture-proof design, ideal for outdoor activities
  • Foldable design, very convenient to store. Light weight and easy to carry 

 

COLOR OPTION- DARK GREY

 Living a sedentary lifestyle and sitting for long periods can be more damaging to your health that you can ever imagine. Back pains, sciatica, neck problems and even heart disease can all be direct results from sitting uncomfortably. 

 Many materials including latex used to e thought of as the "best" choice for seat cushions. However, these materials do not allow for flow throughout the chair and are breeding grounds for bacteria, dust mites, bed bugs and more. Plus, they can lose their composure, meaning that their padding and functionality diminish over time.

While Memory Foam cushions took the world by storm over the past 20 years, they can quickly break down after intensive use. This means large chunks of foam falling off, leaving a path of debri while compromising their ability to help your body.

Why E.V.A. over Memory Foam?

EVA Cushion is made of soft and solid foam of a very good quality, with no smell: EVA-foam (ethylene vinyl acetate). EVA feels like velvet and resembles the feeling of human skin, therefore it gives a safe feeling to children. Moreover, EVA is partly made from natural rubber, one of the least harmful synthetic materials. With optimal combustion, only CO2 and H2O are released, so  So we can say that EVA is a rather environmentally friendly plastic.

 EVA's design lifts the coccyx to align your posture, while offering the support that your buttox and thighs need while sitting. This keeps your back straight, shoulders up and ensures that your entire body achieves its natural S-Curve, which is vital to a comfortable seating position.

 By promoting proper posture, EVA begins building your core muscles. This offers the stability that your entire body needs to maintain a strong and healthy posture, as the muscles provide the balance that your spine needs to be free from pain and discomfort.

  • Durable, Long-lasting 
  • Easy-to-clean 
  • Waterproof  
  • Lightweight 

Sharing what Kickstarter backers think of EVA Cushion...

We asked, "What do you think of EVA Cushion?"  Some of us already spoke of EVA Cushion as such:

"Does sitting mean pain for you? EVA Cushion is the answer."

"Best comfort and pain prevention for long hours of sitting in office."

"Finally give to your back the comfort it deserves:)"

"An ergonomically sound solution to promote healthy sitting. "

 Version 1 was built like Crocs- similar compounds and resources. But in Kickstarter Special Edition, we are making it as soft as we can while we keep it as tight as we can in order to keep the "SUPPORT" & "ERGONOMIC" features.

The Very First EVA Cushion

We could not get out of the box. We thought that a cushion supposed to be a cushion. We made the sitting surface to shape like a butt with a distinctive edge around the cushion. It was more like a butt cradle. It had the significant problems: comfortability, durability and likability; especially the base material of the cushion. itself.

DEVELOPMENTS

After the moderate success of the FIRST EVA CUSHION with some failures in the mix, we started to develop our second and third versions. We kept the outer edges and cradle as well as its unique design language. But we created a big hole to ease the pressure on seat bones. We started to cut them into small pieces and assembled them like a puzzle. We had big big improvements in a short time as we could try the new design right away as we did not have to wait for either 3D drawings or new mock-ups to come out from the factory.

story:
Black rice bran has been known as a rich source of skin improvement substances. However, cause of the rigid structure of the rice bran itself, it is hard to extract the skin improvement substances in perfect condition.

QB Skin Lab Team has researched for years to extract those antioxidant, wrinkle improvement, brightening substance of the black rice bran. And finally developed an extract method based on fermentation process, which enabled to deliver the outstanding skin improvement effects of the black rice bran to consumers.

 

LuBi Ampoule is an advanced serum which uses fermented black rice bran extracts, which provides you a wide range of skin improvement effects.

 

The table below, shows superior anti aging, whitening and wrinkle improvement effect of black rice compared to ordinary rice(white rice).

LuBi is an ampoule that harnesses the nutrients in black rice bran to create powerful anti-aging effects for the skin! This is all made possible due to our in-house research and development of the Solid-State Ion Fermentation Technique that our team created.

With this technique, we were able to extract skin improvement substances of the black rice bran in the best condition. In addition, we were able to reduce the particle size to make it smaller than the average skin pore. This means that the anti-aging nutrients and other skin improvement substances contained within black rice bran will be able to penetrate into the deepest layers of your skin!

Even though black rice bran has many outstanding benefits for our skin, it is difficult to extract all the nutrients from each grain because of its solid structure. However, our in-house developed solid-state ion fermentation Technology uses acidic ionized water to extract all the key nutrients from the hard outer layers of each grain. This process makes LuBi ampoule available to provide customers wide range of skin effects such as antioxidation, wrinkle improvement, brightening and moisturizing.

 

Our in-house technology extracts only the best skincare components from black rice bran. LuBi ampoule’s antioxidant(anti-aging) and wrinkle improvement components that are rich in black rice help restore firm facial skin. In addition, black rice’s brightening and moisturizing features help improve uneven skin tone and help the skin stay moisturized for longer.

 
 

The apple that turned brown in the apple test above represents aged skin. Made of black rice extracts that are rich in antioxidant(anti-aging) ingredients, LuBi ampoule was able to restore the brown apple back to its original fresh color. This anti-aging property in LuBi ampoule can help prevent skin aging and give your skin a more youthful glow.

 

Your skin tone becomes uneven and darker as it ages due to the melanin production(pigmentation). This process is similar to the discoloration that occurs with apples that are exposed to oxygen for a prolonged period. As you can see on the image, once LuBi ampoule is applied on the apple slice, the area that was originally discolored is restored to its original form. The brightening effects will help improve your skin tone as well.

 

Moisturizing components (ceramides) are rich in black rice which helps the skin maintain its moisture, and keeps your skin from becoming dry.

 
 

Even though black rice bran has many outstanding benefits for our skin, it is difficult to extract all the nutrients from each grain because of its solid structure. However, our in-house developed solid-state ion fermentation Technology uses acidic ionized water to extract all the key nutrients from the hard outer layers of each grain. This process also makes LuBi ampoule's molecular size smaller than an average facial skin pore so that the nutrients can be delivered to the deepest skin layers.

 
 
 

LuBi ampoule goes all the way into the deeper skin layers with its small molecular size. Other skincare products’ molecules do not get absorbed completely and therefore, the remaining residue on the surface of the skin can cause blockage in your pores and result in skin troubles.

 

When we dropped water and LuBi ampoule on each flower petal, the petal with LuBi ampoule was absorbed faster than the petal with water. Like the test above, LuBi ampoule absorbs rapidly into your skin and helps your skin maintain its moisture without any sticky residue leftover.

LuBi Also Works Great For Men!

 
 
 
 

LuBi contains no animal-derived ingredients or by-products. Furthermore, no animal testing occured in the creation of LuBi ampoule.

 
 

We, QB Skin LAB team, is made up of Biochemical Engineering researchers and experts in the South Korean beauty industry. We have in-house developed technology and have extensive experience with material supply and production. This lessens the margin of error. And so, our team’s goal is to minimalize the distribution margin and provide a product of the best quality at reasonable prices to our backers.

 
 
 
 

Risks and challenges



Since we have decided to develop the black rice ion fermentation product ‘LuBi’ Ampoule, we have worked over the past 6 months to find the best combination rate to provide high quality skin care product to consumers.
Our research team, which consists of Seoul National University professors, our manufacturer team, and our overseas sales department have worked under one goal, one vision to build a company with a successful Kickstarter campaign as a strong foundation. We are confident we will keep to our planned schedule, however there may be some events that may occur that are out of our control. Should an unexpected setback arise, we will take the necessary steps to monitor and resolve the issue during each step of the production and delivery process. It goes without saying that we will also update our backers on a regular basis so that they can stay well informed about our progress.

Thank you for your support.

story:
Help our hero Shannon get back on his feet

In late 2011, Shan was running on the beach and got a blister on his foot. This rapidly developed into a medical emergency, and without warning his body was ravaged by a massive infection which quickly spread throughout his body. After a total of five surgeries, and weeks in the hospital he had to have his foot amputated and is struggling to recover from this devastating loss. He has no medical insurance and his profession as a commercial painter requires the use of ladders, so he has been unable to work since the injury.

Shan has spent his life helping others through volunteering for March of Dimes, Special Olympics, Feeding the Homeless, and many other charitable causes. Now he needs YOUR help. Due to the staggering medical bills (over 30K), he was forced to sell most of his personal belongings and does not have a vehicle. Any contribution, even a dollar would make a massive difference in his life as he lives in a rural area and it is difficult for him to get around.

Your help will go towards a prosthetic, medical bills, immediate expenses, and a cheap running vehicle. Our concerns are that his wounds are not healing right and he will risk having another infection if he cannot be mobile. Please help our Superman get back to life.

story:
Our Story

My name is Signe Green, and I'd like to go home to California this February. I live in a small town in Michigan and every year I get very sick because I don't get enough sunlight. I am a college student currently enrolled full-time and I miss the sunshine, and I would like to go where it is warm this winter. I was born and raised in California, and I moved to Michigan five years ago, each year I get more and more sick, either by bronchitis or s.a.d. I don't have any extra money to spend on a trip because right now I have a job, but I'm using my income to pay for college.

The Impact

If I don't make it home to California for a week, I might get very sick again. Last year in February I bruised my ribs by coughing because I had had bronchitis for three months. I wasn't sure I'd ever get well again, and the cold air in Michigan makes it very hard for me to breathe.


What We Need

I need to raise about 2000 dollars - enough to cover my plane expense there and back, and my lodgings for a week. Staying in California is expensive, and it is also very expensive to fly there, a usual flight costs about 1,200 dollars round trip.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help me raise money so I can be healthy this year! Share this site with your friends, your family, and anyone else who might care.

story:
Joshua Daniel -

 

Joshua Daniel is the most funloving and positive person you will ever meet. Everyone that knows Josh gushes over how loving and sweet he is. He never has a negative thing to say. He loves his family and friends more than anything in the world. Josh lives life to the fullest and is full of so much excitement and adventure! Josh is loved by so many people. 

 

The longest day..-

On November 9, 2012 Josh Daniel was headed up highway 80 to play in the seasons freshly fallen snow. He was stopped on his way up to help a fellow motorist put on their tire chains. While headed back to his truck, Josh was struck by an oncoming vehicle that had lost control and swerved off of the road. Josh was in a deep coma for a week. He suffered from hemorrhages in his brain, a broken pelvis, a shattered hand, and fractures in his neck. Josh has undergone multiple surgeries on his head, pelvis, and left hand. The past month in ICU has been the longest of Joshua's life. He has been fighting so hard and is making amazing progress. He is slowly waking up more and more. His eyes are open for multiple hours everyday. He is following simple commands and is responding to doctors and family.

 

The road ahead-


Josh's road to recovery is going to be very long. His medical bills are stockpiling. We are asking for donations to help with Josh's medical expenses and recovery. All of the money donated goes directly to Joshua's immediate family. Every little bit helps!

 

If you cannot donate you can help by getting the word out and linking this page to your facebook.

 

We love you Josh!! You are so strong and we are so proud of you!

story:
Hey friends! I'm Shahmeer. On July 31, I left Seattle on my bicycle loaded down with all of my possessions. The destination: the end of the road. Ushuaia, Argentina, over ten thousand miles away. As I approach the US-Mexico border, I can honestly say I'm having a blast. 

I saved up a decent chunk of money while in school and worked at a salmon cannery in Alaska in June to make up the rest. I'm happily living on $10 a day, but the money won't last forever. Your $10 donation will keep me going for another day on this fantastically long trek to Argentina. Your money will go to things like contact lenses so I can continue to see, oranges so I don't get scurvy, and the occasional stay in a hostel when camping in my tent just doesn't feel safe. 

Include your address with your donation and I'll send you a postcard from wherever I am! Check out my blog at www.tenthousandsouth.wordpress.com.

story:
As a successful athlete, I bring ethics and hard work to any challenge or group I am a member of.

As an athlete, I know I am a role model to young aspiring athletes and I conduct myself in a respectable and appropriate manner in all situations, in and out of the cage.

By donating to help fund my professional debut 10 week training camp, you will receive more than the standard thank you.

Each and every individual that helps and donates any amount of money towards my training will receive a signed photo at the end of this campaign...

Contributing to me will allow me  the peace of mind to focus on my Professional goals and to continue my  focus on my aspirations.

Training 40+ hours a week and being a full time mother of 2 boys puts me under greater amounts of emotional and financial stress.

My training is typically costing me on average $2000.00 a month and I typically have a $5000 deficit per year.

 

By making a donation , you put your trust in me and I become an ambassador for the East Coast. As with every opportunity, I will represent the East Coast with the highest level of morals and ethics.

 

A little bit about me:

Cassie Crisano was born on June 27, 1980 in Middletown, New York. She spent her childhood years growing up in a small town nestled in the Catskill region of Ellenville New York. Crisano participated in numerous sports as a child. Baseball, Softball, Field Hockey, Wrestling…. You name it, she played it…. In High School, Crisano joined the all male wrestling team. Crisano became the first female wrestler ever in Section 9 to win a Varsity match against a male wrestler other than by forfeit. Crisano went from wrestling novice to finishing second at the first Women’s National Wrestling tournament in Albuquerque, NM. She was also the 138lb New York State women’s champion and finished second at the Northeast Regionals in Syracuse, NY. She posted an impressive 20-2 record. Crisano continued wrestling outside of High School competing in recreational tournaments on the East Coast. In 2002 she was involved in a auto accident that almost ended her life. She defeated what was supposed to be the impossible and decided it was time to return to the mats. In 2009 she returned to the mats and is now preparing to make her Professional debut as a MMA Fighter in September 2012.  Crisano who once made her marks on the mat as an NY native girl is ready to make her mark in the cage for the world..........

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute,  that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • You can help me get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
HELP THE ZOOKMANN!

Jesse's in the hospital. Help us get him a sweet get well present!

Dear Friends of Jesse,

As you may or may not know jesse had a complication with one of his medicines two weeks ago and was admitted to sf general hospital where hell be for the next couple of weeks. After that he will be under supervised care during his recovery.

From what I've what I've heard and read the process is pretty intense and far from fun and is scary enough to be potentially fatal. Jesse is in great hands though with amazing doctors and family supporting him.

Jesse's family and my have an idea to adopt jesse the sphinx cat he's wanted for years and his docs think it would be a great comfort animal to help him through his recovery and the rough next few months.

Any extra cash will be used for misc hospital bills and odds and ends in his new home.

Jesse has also told me he will be happy to name the cat after the largest contributor (if they want).

Thanks for all of the love and support for our buddy!

story:
[campaign founded, stretch goal added]

Aiming for £1000 ! ! !      Do or do not, there is no try.

Booklet with instructions published will be then.

I'm 27 and I spend most of my time in front of a computer. To keep myself fit I practice yoga quite a bit (from 2008). Having tried various schools (Hatha, Iyengar, Jivamukti, Bikram) I've finally found the one - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rocket_Yoga - it's called "Rocket" because it gets you there faster.

What is exceptional here?

Not always there is enough time for complete, undisturbed practice.

That is why I will create independent units (15 mins, 30 mins, 45 mins, 1 hour) that will comfortably fit into your busy schedule or lunchbreak.

What you will get?

  • One of the kind postcard with artwork of visionary artist Emma Lucy
    •   
  • Soundtrack for your practice - creatively sourced - I will use my contacts to bring you music "out of this world" and promote independent artists.
  • Full recording with instructions as well as 15, 30, 45 and 60 minutes versions so you'll always find some time.

***

Please share: TheRocketYoga.com

Any questions: TheRocketYoga@gmail.com

There is a chance items will be sold afterwards but definitely for more.

story:
My Tale, in Seven Parts

  1. I'm a full-time working mom, yogi, cook, reader, New Englander. Former two-legged (and slow) marathoner. 
  2. In 2009 I lost my leg below the knee after contracting an infection.  I dove right back into my life (working, mothering, cooking, doing yoga). But since losing my leg I have been unable to run with with my kids, even across the backyard. 
  3. Thought my chance to run was over. 
  4. UNTIL I attended a Challenged Athletes Foundation running clinic and within five minutes was running again, happily. 
  5. With only a walking leg, running more than 100 feet at a time is impractical (and painful). 
  6. Running prostheses are considered "luxury items" by insurance companies, so I have to (LOL) foot the bill myself. 
  7. Help me get running again, to show the world what's possible, to run with my kids, to enjoy the meditative powers of a good run, to be a source of strength for others going through physical challenges. 

Getting a Running Prosthesis

The average below the knee prosthesis is $20k. Make my dream of running again possible with your contribution. 

Once I get this new leg I plan to train regularly (especially looking forward to running with my daughter, Elke) and participate in area 5ks.  I only wanted to be limited by my commitment to running, not my equipment. 

And There's More

All contributions over the cost of this prosthesis will go to the Challenged Athletes Foundation (CAF), who generously held a running clinic in Boston in October 2013 where famed trainer Bob Gailey taught me how to run with a prosthesis and I got to meet gold-medal Olympian (and my personal hero), Joan Benoit Samuelson.

Run with Us!

Elke and I plan to run the Boston Color Me Rad 5k on May 31st. We are running as Team Leg Up and would love you to join us. 

Prosthetic Parity

Remember how I said insurance companies consider running legs (and any special activity legs) "luxury items"? While my insurance company won't cover a running leg, I am still one of the lucky ones. I have insurance that pays for good walking legs. Not everyone is as lucky. Many amputees aren't properly insured for even basic walking legs. I am hoping to take this opportunity to discuss the challenges of prosthetic coverage (you'll be hearing more from me on this one!). 

More on this issue from Peggy Chenoweth (AKA the Amputee Mommy). 
Prosthetic Parity Exposed

And the Amputee Coalition's Arms and Legs Are Not a Luxury campaign. 

Thanks to Phil Aiken for naming this campaign and Glenn Britland for designing the logo. 

More on the Perks


My in-house rainbow loomer, Elke. 


Me and my creative team.

Help me get running again, to show the world what's possible, to run with my kids, to enjoy the meditative powers of a good run, to be a source of strength for others going through physical challenges. 
Getting a Running ProsthesisThe average below the knee prosthesis is $20k. Make my dream of running again possible with your contribution. Once I get this new leg I plan to train regularly (especially looking forward to running with my daughter, Elke) and participate in area 5ks.  I only wanted to be limited by my commitment to running, not my equipment. And There's MoreAll contributions over the cost of this prosthesis will go to the Challenged Athletes Foundation (CAF), who generously held a running clinic in Boston in October 2013 where famed trainer Bob Gailey taught me how to run with a prosthesis and I got to meet gold-medal Olympian (and my personal hero), Joan Benoit Samuelson.Run with Us!Elke and I plan to run the Boston Color Me Rad 5k on May 31st. We are running as Team Leg Up and would love you to join us. Prosthetic ParityRemember how I said insurance companies consider running legs (and any special activity legs) "luxury items"? While my insurance company won't cover a running leg, I am still one of the lucky ones. I have insurance that pays for good walking legs. Not everyone is as lucky. Many amputees aren't properly insured for even basic walking legs. I am hoping to take this opportunity to discuss the challenges of prosthetic coverage (you'll be hearing more from me on this one!). More on this issue from Peggy Chenoweth (AKA the Amputee Mommy). Prosthetic Parity ExposedAnd the Amputee Coalition's Arms and Legs Are Not a Luxury campaign. Thanks to Phil Aiken for naming this campaign and Glenn Britland for designing the logo. More on the PerksMy in-house rainbow loomer, Elke. Me and my creative team.

story:
The Yoga Bandit™ aromatherapy product line was born as a hobby. I wanted to make a product that was as natural as possible, promoted healthy skin and combined the therapeutic benefits of aromatherapy. A friend of mine who is an aromatherapist once told me the story of the four thieves and she made a blend based on it. I loved how it smelled and I loved how it made me feel when I smelled it. We lost touch many years ago but I couldn't get that blend out of my head. I couldn't find it anywhere, so I started playing with my own blend loosely based on the four thieves. I will never forget the moment I added the last drop to the blend, took a good whiff and knew that was it! That was my blend! Now I just needed something to call it. As a yoga teacher, I wanted to give it a "yoga" theme and since it was loosely based on the four thieves’ blend I wanted to use another word for thief. With that, The Yoga Bandit essential oil blend was born.

To start, let me tell you the story of the four thieves. As the bubonic plague ravaged Europe in the year 1413, the story of the four thieves arrived on the scene and the story has changed history. They were captured and charged with robbing the dead and dying victims but it was noticed that they remained free of the plague. When the thieves were tried, the magistrate offered leniency if they would reveal how they resisted contracting the infection as they performed their gruesome acts. The four thieves explained that they were perfumers and spice traders and finally exposed their special concoction of aromatic herbs, including cloves and rosemary that they rubbed on their hands, ears, and temples. This prevented them from contracting the disease! They hoped to receive a lighter sentence by cooperating with the magistrate, not sure if they did though.

The first product I made was the lip balm. I thought it would be a great way to save money and perhaps have a nice, unique gift to give my family and friends. I started experimenting with different formulas until I got exactly what I wanted. I made a few tubes mixing in my essential oil blend and started handing them out to my family and friends to try. To my pleasant surprise, it was a hit! Before I knew it, the requests came pouring in to have a sample to give to their family and friends. It was quickly compared to other nationally recognized premium lip balms on the market.

After receiving such a great response about the lip balm, I quickly realized that I was on to something and decided it would be great to create a natural ointment that would moisturize and heal the skin. I started researching the healing properties of various natural oils and ingredients and quickly got to work cooking up several prototypes that would soon be The Yoga Bandit 'OM'ollient (my play on the word emollient). I packaged it up and sent it on its way to everyone I could. Again, the response was overwhelming! I started receiving daily messages telling me how much people loved it. Not only that, I began receiving feedback on all the things people were using the ointment for: from skin irritations to burns, scrapes, eczema, insect bites to even a natural insect repellent. As I shared Yoga Bandit with others and talked about my product, I started getting suggestions for other products I should offer. It became very clear to me that my hobby was turning into an opportunity! I didn't want to get carried away and offer everything under the sun. After all, I have a full time job and teach yoga in the evenings. I needed to keep it limited to something I could realistically manage in my spare time. I wanted to provide quality products that people used every day and that made them feel good. I began thinking of the things I wanted to buy myself but could never seem to find. From that moment forward, I spent all my spare time researching, experimenting and creating new product to add to the collection. Yoga Bandit was born from lip balm and has now evolved to include, ointment, body lotion, soaps and sprays.

I realize there are many other skin care products on the market. However, I have dedicated a lot of time researching the ingredients to make my Yoga Bandit products. I've selected the essential oils for their benefits as described by the NAHA (National Association for Holistic Aromatherapy) and AromaWeb. For example, these sources say Cinnamon oil is good for exhaustion, rheumatism, scabies, and stress; and that Clove Bud (Eugenia caryops) can help ease arthritis, asthma, bronchitis, rheumatism, sprains and strains. They say that Eucalyptus is helpful in treating respiratory problems, helps to boost the immune system, and can relieve muscle tension. Lavender is known to aid relaxation and is also useful in treating wounds and burns. Lemon is very uplifting, yet relaxing. It can be helpful in treating wounds and in deodorizing. Peppermint and Rosemary are useful in easing muscle aches and tension. Tea Tree Oil is natural anti-fungal oil. I also took great care in selecting the right carrier oils. I included ones that are best for the skin based on their moisturizing effects and Vitamin E oil content that wouldn't clog the pores. Yoga Bandit combines ingredients that have the properties to promote healthy skin with aromatherapy to promote a healthy mind as well.

Yoga Bandit is now selling at farmers markets, community market days and at local wellness centers which is all wonderful. It's now time to invest more time and money in manufacturing Yoga Bandit to be enjoyed by everyone inside and out of our local community. We have our marketing strategy in place, currently pitching to major retailers and are ready to invest in the proper manufacturing tools to produce our product on a larger scale. That's where you come in; with your help, soon, Yoga Bandit will be able to be found and enjoyed everywhere.

Your funding will assist us in securing custom labels, bulk product and supplies, manufacturing equipment and insurance. As we grow, proceeds will be reinvested for product expansion, advertising, public relations and mass production. Our ultimate goal far exceeds the desire to sell Yoga Bandit in stores worldwide, we would like to pay it forward by establishing a business opportunity for others to promote health and well being while having the freedom to pursue the work life balance we all so very much deserve.

We're excited to offer these products, and look forward to Yoga Bandit stealing your heart!

story:
My Plea for a Handicapped Van

I was afflicted with multiple sclerosis as a college student and have been bound in a wheelchair for 12 years now.  For transportation from my apartment, I rely on a local transit company that provides curb to curb service.  However, I have to schedule them well in advance of any appointment or outing, and there is a definite pick-up time and return time.  If I am at the doctor's office and the doctor is running late, I have to leave when the transit company shows up at the scheduled time to take me home.  Then I have to make another appointment to see the doctor.  With my own van equipped for a motorized wheelchair, I won't be under any time constraints when going places. Also, it would be so much easier in my own van to carry groceries and other purchased items than having to load them in the transit vehicle.

I really never know from day to day how fatigued I wll be and how much pain there will be.  So, I can go shopping, go to church, go to other events and come home when my energy leaves me instead of waiting for my scheduled return time.  A handicapped van will give me the freedom to leave my apartment and do something for as long as my energy holds up.  Also, I would not have to be concerned about an accidental mix-up in the transit schedule, and being left somewhere for an excessive amount of time.

Any money raised from this campaign will go to purchasing a handicapped van.  If I raise more than enough, then the excess money will go toward auto insurance, gas, and repairs.

Your contribution will help to give me the freedom to go places when I am most able to, without time limitations, and with the peace of mind to know I can return home when I have to. 

If you feel you cannot contribute, then you can help me by spreading the word about my campaign to as many people as possible. 

Thank you!

story:
Our first Rezist DVD launched in March '14 and was self-funded by its creator, fitness expert Gino Caccavale. Over the past six months, he's been kissing babies, shaking hands, winning a Masters National IFBB Pro Championship, watching DVDs sell, and leading Rezist classes in various New York City parks. For a 49 year old guy, he's pretty active.

What's next on Gino's list? Make a second Rezist DVD featuring kettle bell movements. 

Gino's List:

  • Make 1st Rezist Workout DVD
  • Sell Some Rezist Workout DVDs
  • Lead Rezist Workout Classes in NYC's Parks and Gyms
  • Get Super Shredded for Competition
  • Win IFBB Pro Over 45 Masters Nationals Overall Title
  • Collect IFBB Pro Card
  • Launch Crowdfunding Campaign on IndieGoGo
  • Make a second Rezist DVD featuring kettle bell movements
  • Sell More Rezist Workout DVDs

Now, we'll answer some of your questions... 

What is Rezist?

With our 1st DVD, simply called "Rezist," we brought fitness enthusiasts all over the world a unique 30 minute workout combining 20 dumbbell movements, performed for 1 minute with only 20 seconds of rest between each movement. We also brought them do-it-at-home convenience, because all you need is a TV, a little space, two sets of dumbbells, and an exercise mat. With Gino's trademark "Weights Meet Cardio" concept, we've also brought them results, with a little spare time, and a food plan.

A Food Plan?

Yes, a food plan. We worked closely with Clinical Nutritionist Linda Stephens, to create a booklet which comes with each of our original Rezist DVDs. It has a shopping list, nutritional suggestions, and guidelines for both males and females on how to create the perfectly balanced diet. We believe that with a perfectly balanced diet, and a perfectly balanced workout, you're pretty much unstoppable.

♫♫♫♫ ~ These are Some Perks. Perk it Up - Perk it Up - Perk it Up! ~ ♫♫♫♫

For the 2nd DVD, Why Kettle Bells?

Like any effective workout, once mastered, your need for variety is fueled and we just keep hearing: “We love Rezist, what’s next?!” So, what's next is for us to supplement the gut busting linear resistance of our original dumbbell movements, with the smoother more core oriented Rezist kettle bell movements. For anyone who has never seen a Kettle Bell, it's basically a weighted ball with a circular handle affixed to the top. They provide a different dimension to training as you can swing and toss them in several directions, as opposed to the straight forward pressing, rowing and curling of the dumbbells. How easy is it? All you need is 2 kettle bells. That’s it! Same 30 minutes, same rest periods, just more exciting core engaging moves. In short, the reason for this campaign is to give our valued customers another exciting option - and to provide our soon to be customers - with two different workouts. Our hope is to offer this double pack of workouts by the holiday season!

Why use crowd-funding instead of trying to find a corporate sponsor?

While the first Rezist DVD has been a great success, making fitness DVDs is expensive and making enough money to invest it in a second project takes some time. Not only does IndieGoGo offer us an opportunity to showcase our original, self-made Rezist dumbbell DVD, raising the money ourselves gives us the freedom to continue an honest marketing campaign. Corporate sponsors often care more about sales than honesty, and we're just not down with that. 


There is in fact a tremendous amount of dishonesty and misleading information in fitness infomercials and product marketing campaigns. Health and wellness is important for all of us in one way or another. On a broader scale, our society struggles to tackle obesity and rising healthcare costs; on a smaller individual scale, many of us constantly strive to improve our fitness and enhance our longevity. However, our efforts are thwarted by a common problem: Fitness industry advertising leads individuals to believe there is a quick and easy fix to reaching the pinnacle of health and fitness. But the truth is there are no shortcuts, period. To be fit and healthy requires work, focus and consistency. My goal is to offer the ever-growing fitness industry an honest approach by introducing a unique workout that is efficient and effective, combining both weights and cardio in one short but challenging workout. That is what Rezist is and that's what your contributions here on IndieGoGo will be going toward. 

***All funds will go to production costs of the DVD - from the video shoot to packaging. If we receive our goal or surpass it, you will see any additional contributions go toward our first infomercial!***

story:
After years of presentations to Austin City Council from toxicologists, chemists, dentists, and concerned Austinites on the dangers of utilizing Hyrdrofluorosilicic Acid, an industrial waste product, to artificially fluoridate our water, we felt a hunger strike was the natural progression in civil disobedience to combat an unresponsive City Council. After 14 days, we were armed with the tools necessary to proceed with a public ballot initiative. We have filed all the necessary paper work with the IRS and state to begin the political action committee, Healthy H2O Austin. We will only need 20,000 registered voter signatures by mid-July to put ending the practice on the ballot in November. We are here to ask those, who support our cause, and can financially afford to do so, to help us cover legal counsel expenses, printing costs, and finance a public awareness campaign. We have no time to waste and are aiming for $3,000 in 30 days. Let's ensure, together, that Austin has healthy H2O for generations to come. 

We say, "Get the 'F' out THIS NOVEMBER, for good!"

We will only need 20,000 registered voter signatures by mid-July to put ending the practice on the ballot in November. story:
What do you need to know?

At the very beginning there was an idea to create a genuine, beautiful, design product that will be user friendly, easy to handle, compact and fun. It was inspired by the original table top football from childhood.

This is the original table top football from childhood.


" It's not just kids who wanna play." 


What is needed to be done?

If you like our idea and product, we would appreciate if you donate some perks that you can find on the right side of this page. Our prototype was created from our own resources and we are aware of the fact that there is still room for improvement. We would like to achieve a more compact, resistant and flawless construction. 


How are we going to use the collected funds ($25.000 and more)?


" With your great help and support we can create an awesome product.    Thank you! "


We'd love to hear from all of you, please don't hesitate to get in touch!

Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

Zdenek & Vasek


K!ck in the News

     www.Appliste.cz (Czech language)

www.Netovinky.com (Czech language)

story:
Cara Hayes and Jessica Zaman would like to raise money for the Kieren Douglas Teenager Cancer Foundation by running the 5K Color Run in Manchester on the 5th July 2014.


Our friend, Kieren Douglas, who was 17, was diagnosed with adenocarcinoma - which usually affects the elderly and attacks the glands - in October 2012 when he was 16, after finding a lump on his neck. He passed away 4 months later.
Ideally we would like to raise as much as possible for our beautiful friend as 100% of donations will go to the foundation.

His family have now set up the Kieren Douglas Teenage Cancer Foundation and hope to set up a teen scheme for the paediatric ward at the Nottingham's Queens Medical Centre which looked after Kieren and also raise awareness for teenager cancer sufferers. 

His mother Ruth has said the staff on E39 were brilliant, but Kieren was at an awkward age, he was in a private room with intermittent wifi and was stuck for the things that make you feel like a teenager, with most of the entertainment revolving around infants. So the foundation is planning to provide boxes to teenage cancer victims and visiting parents on the ward, which will be full of goodies including vouchers and toiletries.

Amazingly the foundation has already bought 16 TVs for the paediatric ward at the Queen's Medical Centre, where Kieren was treated with the money raised already.

The 5K Color Run is already a highly advertised event and we would like to not only raise as much as possible for the foundation but also make others aware of Kierens Foundation and show what they are wanting to achieve.

And of course, do it for Kieren.
story_txt: Cara Hayes and Jessica Zaman would like to raise money for the Kieren Douglas Teenager Cancer Foundation by running the 5K Color Run in Manchester on the 5th July 2014.Our friend, Kieren Douglas, who was 17, was diagnosed with adenocarcinoma - which usually affects the elderly and attacks the glands - in October 2012 when he was 16, after finding a lump on his neck. He passed away 4 months later.Ideally we would like to raise as much as possible for our beautiful friend as 100% of donations will go to the foundation.His family have now set up the Kieren Douglas Teenage Cancer Foundation and hope to set up a teen scheme for the paediatric ward at the Nottingham's Queens Medical Centre which looked after Kieren and also raise awareness for teenager cancer sufferers. His mother Ruth has said the staff on E39 were brilliant, but Kieren was at an awkward age, he was in a private room with intermittent wifi and was stuck for the things that make you feel like a teenager, with most of the entertainment revolving around infants. So the foundation is planning to provide boxes to teenage cancer victims and visiting parents on the ward, which will be full of goodies including vouchers and toiletries.Amazingly the foundation has already bought 16 TVs for the paediatric ward at the Queen's Medical Centre, where Kieren was treated with the money raised already.The 5K Color Run is already a highly advertised event and we would like to not only raise as much as possible for the foundation but also make others aware of Kierens Foundation and show what they are wanting to achieve.And of course, do it for Kieren.

story:
We are passionate about food!

We met at Per Se in 2005, about 20 pounds lighter and with less lines, with the ability to work from 11am-2am.  After 3 years we graduated, and fell madly in love.
We began our boutique catering company, Maison Prive in 2008.  Our experience in restaurants such as Blue Hill at Stone Barns (where Jen was the opening Saucier, or meat cook), Bouchon (Jim was the Chef de Cuisine), Per Se (we were both Sauciers) and Cafe Boulud Palm Beach (Jim an opening Chef de Partie) gave an incredible canvas to begin our own art.
After catering for some time in NYC and Greenwich, we moved our lives and babies to Bedford, New York, in search of greener, calmer pastures.  We have waited patiently for a new opportunity to arise, a chance to bring our food into the local retail sector, a chance to feed our community with healthy, affordable options that can sometimes be lacking in smaller towns.  We want everyone to fall madly in love too...with our food, our town, each other and the ritual of the family dinner.
Little known fact: we are also history buffs! We discovered that in the late 1890's, the store G.E. Brown existed right in the village, and served the local community.  We thought that bringing back a part of history would also be a crucial, and much-needed component when thinking about the preservation of the history of Bedford.
We are eternally grateful for any and all support, as we cannot do this without you!

What We Are Asking For

We are hoping to raise $29,500 in order to help us complete our project.  The first $15,000 raised is dedicated solely to higher-level coffee and espresso equipment (brewers, grinders, espresso machine).  

The space that we have leased is about 30 years old and is in need of update and much repair, a lot more than we anticipated.  The pre-existing commercial exhaust fan which was attached to the building is no longer up to code and now needs to be replaced.  We will be able to accomplish this with $12,000.

With the remaining funds we would like to transform the existing space into a comfortable store that mirrors the idyllic charm of our town, with good music.  A warm, inviting environment with an amazing coffee program and ambience--it's not just about the food.  We would like to upgrade the heating and A/C systems to make the space more comfortable for everyone. 

Any funds above and beyond will allow us to install larger equipment that will help us expand our catering program into nearby towns. 

The Perks!

Here's the fun part.  We are not asking for donations.  In lieu of your support, we have many rewards to give back!  I think you'll find that there is something for everyone.

The Impact

We have done our homework and have spoken to many people in the town about what they would specifically like to see.   We've done surveys, asked questions, spoken to other local businesses.  We feel that there is a strong need for a retail location that provides healthy food at affordable prices.  Great coffee, breakfast on the go, lunches, dinners for you and your family.  And fun, casual, catered affairs. We have had many late nights discussing what WE want, as Chefs and also parents.  A sandwich that your child will crave, a dessert that you can't live without, great coffee available early!

Kids!  As parents of a 4 year old and a 23-month old, we understand the value of being able to grab-and-go.  We also understand the importance of caffeine.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out!  We are so very passionate about this that we can't wait to serve you and the community.  Word of mouth has always been very positive for us as we typically do not advertise.  

Lastly, we want to say how much we care.  We have chosen a very hard path, a career that took 15 years to establish and over 90 hours a week of work, which was "normal" for a very long time, with very little pay.

It's not like it is on reality TV.  True Chefs have a challenging path but we love every second of it...

  Nights where we collapsed on the couch, days where all we wanted to do was sleep but couldn't.  We care so deeply about food and believe that it is the foundation to a great family and life...and hope that we can share a little bit of us with you.

In food, love and health, we thank you.

In food, love and health, we thank you.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Glen Kurti. I am the founder of "i CAN Play CANADA". This is a non-profit organization that will help underprivileged kids across Canada get funding and play Sports like everyone has the right to play sports:

  • I have been an athlete for over 24 years (yes I'm that old). I have played competitive soccer, and was coached by a national team coach at age 7. 
  • When I moved to Canada in 2000, I started picking up a sport called Basketball. I played for the first time in the summer of 2002, and I never looked back. 
  • Now I have been a soccer coach for over 10 years, a basketball coach for over 5 years, and refereed, organized and ran multiple sports leagues, and leadership events.
  • My campaign is very important because I saw first hand what this can do in a kids life. I coached basketball 3 years ago for the first time at Jane and Finch in Toronto Ontario, and I got paired up with a very tempered kid. Despite the challenge, by showing him respect and mercy, I was able to influence him in a way that now he helps coach the league. I have seen hundreds of kids smile during my time coaching and refereeing, and want to see every kid in Canada smile, because that is what kids deserve, no matter the circumstances.

Think back at your childhood, and now look at kids around you now, and think what kids today are missing out on. 

Why am I found Raising

I am going to Africa for 1 month to help coach a local soccer team, as well as run sports camps for kids in Ethiopia. I took this opportunity to get Londoners to open up their closets and garages and start donating soccer balls, basketballs, shoes, shirts and shorts for the kids in Africa. So far, I have collected over 200 soccer balls, over 50 basketballs, over 100 shoes, and over 100 uniforms. I still have 1 month before I leave, and more stuff is coming in every day!

What We Need & What You Get

So here is what I need funding for:

  • I am going to Africa for 1 month to coach a local soccer team, and also run sports camps for kids there
  • I have collected over 200 soccer balls, over 100 pairs of shoes, and over 100 uniforms. 
  • I am raising my own founds for the trip, but I need help with the cost of flying a shipping container to Africa with all the equipment that I have.
  • In making some inquires, that container can cost me $1000 - $1500
  • I would love if you could sponsor the container for me. 
  • I will post pictures of every single kid that gets a ball, shirt and pair of shoes

 The Impact
  • This will put smiles on hundreds of kids faces, and hopefully motivate people here in London to start donating more of their clothes and equipment that they don't need anymore, to help kids that truly need it.

Other Ways You Can Help

What I really need other than money is people support. I need people to spread the word, and I need volunteers to help me run the leagues:

  • I need coaches for the leagues (soccer, basketball, volleyball and baseball for now)
  • I need referees for all the above mentioned sports.
  • I need video editors who can help me edit promotiaonal vidoes geared specifically to companies we are marketing to. 
  • I need people that have contacts with organizations, companies or athletes that can help me. I am very passionate and can usually impact anyone I talk to, but I do need to meet the people first, and that;s where you can help. Help me build a network 
  • Promotions. Anyone that can help me promote via Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media avenue is welcome. All my info is on this page.
  • And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Post a "no make-up selfie" to raise cancer awareness!? The internet has been divided over this; some people love the idea, some seem to hate it.

Debate is good, talking about cancer is good. But imagine if everyone who has posted a selfie, a status, a comment, donated £1 to a cancer charity (or whatever they can afford)? How much would we raise?

Have you posted an opinion on the no make-up selfie campaign? If so, could you  donate a small amount to fight cancer? LETS MAKE OUR OPINIONS REALLY COUNT!

Proceeds will be split 50/50 and go to both Macmillan and the Christie Hospital.

If you can't donate, then share the link! If you can donate, share the link!

MILLIONS OF THANKS TO THOSE WHO HAVE ALREADY DONATED OR FOUGHT CANCER IN WHATEVER WAY THEY FEEL IS BEST! :-)

story:
Who are We?

Hi! 

My name is Eliana Kuan, and I am a secondary 5 student from Royal West Academy. I and 4 of my fellow classmates, are a part of the 'Real Beauty Team." Together we are putting on a charity Fashion Show in April, to help promote the importance of having a healthy body image. We hope to inspire our fellow classmates to let go of any insecurities they may have about themselves. All the proceeds raised by the show will be donated to ANEB, Anorexie et Boulimie Quebec. 
Eating disorders are a problem that I personally do not take lightly, having been previously hospitalized for one myself. The Real Beauty team is passionate about this great cause, and is working extremely hard to make everyone, (both guys and girls), understand that they are beautiful. As teenagers, it is a very easy to let the media influence your decisions and even change the way you feel about yourself. This is what we are trying to change by putting on this fashion show. We are proud to be showcasing real people who are confident and happy in their own skin. As I said before, having had an eating disorder, I know how hard it can be to live with, and I never want others to have to love through what I lived through.

Why do we need the funds?

As I'm sure you can imagine, putting on a fashion show can get expensive! We have already organized many other fundraisers, both inside and outside of school. Unfortunately it is just not enough. Now we need your help! Please donate, any amount helps!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, that's OK!! Share our Facebook page and links to our other fundraising events, as well as our Indiegogo fundraising page!

Thank you,

xoxo
