story:
WE HAVE CHANGED THE DIRECTION OF OUR CAMPAIGN DUE TO THE SEVERE EBOLA OUTBREAK. THE SAME TECHNOLOGY THAT IS USED FOR WATER PURIFICATION EXPLAINED BELOW, CAN BE MODIFIED TO PURIFY BLOOD. 

YES, THIS IS VERY REAL. EBOLA CAN BE CURED AND STOPPED FROM SPREADING BY IMPLEMENTING THIS LIFE SAVING TECHNOLOGY. 

THIS SAME TECHNOLOGY CAN BE USED TO PURIFY AIR AND SURFACES, AS WELL. 

IT IS OFFICIALLY IN YOUR HANDS AT THIS POINT. HOW DO YOU TELL THE WORLD THAT YOU CAN STOP A PANDEMIC DEAD IN IT'S TRACKS?

THANK YOU. BLESSINGS. 

The following is our original campaign, before water took the back seat to this massive EBOLA outbreak. The rest of the campaign explains the water technology. Please IGNORE the $$$ amount being asked for. That was for the original SALTON SEA PROJECT. Whatever resources will be used to make BLOOD PURIFICATION systems. 

We are going to show the world how to restore and protect valuable resources, clean toxic lakes, refill reservoirs, and introduce a first-of-its-kind biomimicry water purification and energy recovery system.

Introducing the GULP CLEAR WATER SYSTEM, for purifying drinking water, contaminated wells, agricultural runoff, waste water, landfill leachate, and sea water.

Our process will set a new benchmark for water quality and alternative energy standards worldwide.

In this campaign we:
  • Explain the Gulp Clear Water System to the best of our ability
  • Give examples of the uses for the system 
  • Give you some AWESOME facts about Gulp Clear Water LLC
  • Show you how you can get involved in something new and good for you.
  • Give you a price break-down
  • Then tell you more about us, our perks we offer, and answers some FAQ
Please check out the full campaign, there is a LOT of information involved.
Remember-- YOU ARE OUR VOICE! Help us PURIFY the WORLD's WATER SUPPLY!


We have had inquiries into more details about the way the GULP system works. We remain somewhat vague about the technology patent that we hold based on several reasons. One of which is that many of the components used in our system are purchased and warranted through other patent holders of specific items. Think of individual pieces that are required to build a car. Each one of these pieces are specially designed for a purpose. We would require that everyone seeing this specific information to sign confidentiality agreements based on our contracts with our suppliers and manufacturers. All components are existing technologies, but we are the only company that holds the technology patent to combine them within one system for the purpose of cleaning water. Due to the liability aspect of confidentiality laws, we are bound by our agreements with our manufacturing partners and license holders to keep some information confidential. None, of the parts of the Gulp System are theoretical, they are all currently being used individually for specialty or commercial purposes. Thank you for your understanding.

THIS IS WHAT WE CAN TELL YOU:

Over the past 8 years, we have been perfecting this technology to bring to the world. Gulp Clear Water has developed a chemical free water purification system capable of removing 99.999% of contaminants out of any water source. 

DO YOU REALIZE WHAT THIS MEANS?!?

Around the world, water is currently cleaned by adding chemicals to burn out the harmful contaminants that are present. The current processes used are proven harmful to humans. With the Gulp Clear Water purification system, people around the world will be able to consume, bath and irrigate with pure, sustainable water.

We are here to set a new standard to combat the Global Water Crisis.

Combining the most cutting edge technology available, the Gulp System:

  • is configurable to purify up to hundreds of millions of gallons per day 
  • uses NO chemicals
  • uses NO reverse osmosis or forward osmosis (the current standard for purification)
  • uses NO outdated UV technology
  • uses NO heat
  • uses NO ozone treatment
  • renders current desalination obsolete

    By utilizing a proprietary and programmable blend of advanced purification media, along with the next generation of germicidal technology, we are able to deliver pure, inexpensive water from any source. 

                   

                                                     


    This process utilizes both FDA approved technologies and the United States CDC (BAT) Best Available Technologies for water purification. 

    With our advanced technologies, we utilize UVC Germicidal LED's for killing microorganisms at the optimal germicidal wavelength, ensuring that even the strongest microorganisms are precisely disassembled at the thiamine base level. This wavelength of light also breaks down chemicals into less harmful sub-components in a process known as Photo-chemical Oxidation. 

    All current technology is not even close in efficacy and efficiency.

    As amazing as this is, this is only one component of our purification process. 


    The result? The following are examples of contaminants removed, but are not limited to:

    • Fertilizers ex: Nitrates and Phosphates

    • Pesticides ex: Organophosphates and Carbamates
    • Pharmaceuticals ex: Antibiotics and Hormones
    • Heavy Metals ex: Lead and Mercury
    • Industrial Pollutants ex: Benzene, Hexavalent Chromium, Flouride
    • Microbial Cysts ex: Cryptosporidium and Giardia
    • Bacteria ex: E. coli and Legionella (Legionnaires)
    • Viruses ex: Malaria, West Nile, Ebola
    • Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCB's) ex: Dielectric and Coolant Fluids
    • Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC's) ex: Chlorinated Byproducts and Total Trihalomethanes (TTHM'S) 
    • Radioactive Isotopes ex: Radium and Strontium
    and MORE

    With the world’s first fully integrated system of advanced hardware, software, and purification technologies, we are able to offer the template that will combat the global water crisis. 

    This is the first and only computational, systematic, precision set of technologies that is completely configurable, scale-able, compatible, and up-gradable. 


    Due to the sensitive legal nature of the specific technologies utilized by the Gulp Clear Water System, we are unable to disclose specific proprietary information or labeling of the figure shown above.



    ﻿The Gulp Clear Water System has been specifically designed with the ability to be deployed as a single mobile unit or an integrated fleet for humanitarian aid or disaster relief. Constructed for easy transport, the system can be calibrated and monitored via satellite anywhere in the world to deliver pure water for proactive solutions and disaster recovery. These systems can be placed on docks or on barges as well, for purification of early onset algae blooms or other pollution inflow to minimize contamination before it has a chance to spread.  



    example mobile applications

    example mobile applications



    Recycling

    When the Gulp Clear Water System follows an electrocoagulation unit, which removes the larger debris, even contaminated waste can become the purest drinking water. 

    This process can be utilized for drinking water, agriculture, aqua culture, semi conductor grade, or industrial. 

    The Gulp Clear Water System revolutionizes water treatment processes, such as treating Leachate (the ground water runoff from landfills) and Frack water in an environmentally sustainable way, at a fraction of current cost.  It can also be utilized to purify rain water, greywater, and groundwater for re-use.

    In addition, the Gulp Clear Water System is made of 100% recyclable materials.

    Municipal

    Municipal water supplies and well-water supplies are fighting to stay above drinking water standards across the United States and around the world. By placing Gulp Clear Water Systems within existing municipal water treatment facilities, we will provide a non-chemical, low cost alternative to produce water that exceeds current drinking water standards to every household and business. Whether it is for drinking, bathing, or watering the garden, pure water will be used.

    Environmental

    Due to severe environmental conditions, several of the world's largest lakes are currently dwindling and more toxic than ever. By implementing the Gulp Clear Water System, even the most contaminated lakes can be restored to their natural, life-giving state.



    • Keith Ervin, the patent holder for Gulp technology, received the "Early Planning Grant" (EPG) in 2009 from the Wisconsin Entrepreneurs' Network for the Gulp Clear Water purification technology. 
    • Gulp Clear Water LLC is currently working with one of the world's most advanced Aqua Culture companies to upgrade their current system. 
    • The world is currently experiencing one of the worst drought and pollution crisis situations in history.
    • In America, the drinking water standards haven't improved since 1975.
    • The first Nobel Peace Prize for Physiology or Medicine winner of the 20th century was Niels Ryberg Finsen in 1903 for his cure of Lupus Vulgaris (Tuberculosis Luposa) with Ultra Violet light. 
    • Agriculture is a major user of ground and surface water in the United States, accounting for approximately 80 percent of the Nation's consumptive water use and over 90 percent in many Western States.
    • Approximately 780 million people lack access to safe drinking water, that's approximately 1 in 9 people.
    • 3.4 million people die each year as a result of unclean drinking water. That is almost the entire city of Los Angeles.
    • 1 child dies every 21 seconds from a water related disease.
    • "[The water and sanitation] crisis claims more lives through disease than any war claims through guns." http://water.org/water-crisis/water-facts/water/


      We need your support to show the world that there is a solution, an AFFORDABLE solution.

      All we need is funding. 

      To give you an example of the standard cost of the "most-advanced" UVC purification technology, California recently finished building a $72 million water purification plant that utilizes out-dated UVC technology and power intensive osmosis membranes. We can purify the same amount of water, to a higher quality for a FRACTION of their cost. 


      The Price Breakdown: You may be wondering, "Why so much $$$????"

      We understand the value of the technology and answers we just gave to the world just by launching this campaign.  
      We have changed our campaign. The money no longer matters at this point. We are trying to save as many lives as possible with whatever resources we can accumulate. This means making as many blood purification systems as possible. 

      What if we do not get the full funding???

      Either way, we will be proceeding with our goal to provide the world with the purest water ever available, whatever that takes.

      We have been working closely with our manufacturer, DCR Fabrication, inc. (http://dcrfabinc.com/) Our blue prints are ready. All our components have been waiting in the wings. All the materials are ready to be shipped and assembled, with our team of physicists and engineers excited and ready to give the world this new solution.  

      This is where YOU come in. 

      We need help. The faster this solution becomes available, the sooner this water quality upgrade will happen and safe, sustainable water WILL be available worldwide.

      Utilizing this approach, we can inexpensively deliver pure water to every person and every industry. 

      With this inexpensive approach and advanced understanding of our most valuable resource, we are Globally Uniting Lives in Prosperity. 

      With pure, sustainable, inexpensive water, everyone wins.

      Please spread the word! Every little bit counts. 



      For your donations, we will send you awesome perks! 



      Bumper Stickers


      Coffee Mug


      Canvas Tote


      Beanie Winter Hat



      The Gulp Clear Water T-Shirt 



      There may be slight variation in the designs when printed. Please keep this in mind and PLEASE wear our Logo with pride! Not all perks are pictured above. With your donation, you will be bringing the world closer to a HUGE water standard upgrade! A change in the quality of life-- kind of a big deal...



      Our mission is to establish a new quality and standard for water purification and conservation through the Gulp Clear Water System.
      What started out as a one man show, turned into an amazing partnership, which has since turned into a valuable team of passionate experts. We have invested our hearts and souls into this technology during the most important years of our lives. This technology will change water standards and will change lives. We want to put life back into as many people's hands as possible. The effects pure water will have on the world are endless. 
      We truly believe in Globally Uniting Lives in Prosperity by providing pure, sustainable water to as many people and industries as possible. 
      Thank you for your support and we can't wait to see you on the other side of the Salton Sea!


      How do I add the extra shipping amount to my donation?

      1. Select your Gulp Clear Water Perk Package
      2. Edit the Dollar Amount to be $5 or $10 for US shipping (depending on the perk), $15 for Canada and $30 for international shipping.
      3. Purchase
      If the Perk Package had already been purchased:
      1. Select the perk "International Shipping" or the $10 perk 
      2. Use the SAME mailing address that you entered when you purchased your original Perk Package
      3. Purchase

      I'm getting a T-shirt as part of my order. Will you be collecting T-shirt sizes?

      Yes, we will email you after the campaign to collect your T-shirt size.

      How do I share my story if I donated through the "Share YOUR Story" Perk?

      We will send you instructions on how to share your story with the world. Your story will be displayed on our website for a long time, probably forever. 

      What sizes are available for the Gulp Clear Water System? 

      Systems are configurable to accommodate any volume of water from 1 gallon to hundreds of millions of gallons.  

      Once the Gulp Clear Water System purifies the water completely, have all the good minerals been taken out as well? 

      With all the different uses for the purified water and different industries available, the purification system can be programmed according to customer specifications. For example, drinking water can have additional minerals added as desired.


      Sources:

      http://www.sbcounty.gov/museum/exhibits/salton/mk%20quick%20facts.pdf

       http://saltonsea.ca.gov/

      http://www.ers.usda.gov/topics/farm-practices-management/irrigation-water-use.aspx#.U-jZyPldXW4

      http://water.org/water-crisis/water-facts/water/
story_txt:
WE HAVE CHANGED THE DIRECTION OF OUR CAMPAIGN DUE TO THE SEVERE EBOLA OUTBREAK. THE SAME TECHNOLOGY THAT IS USED FOR WATER PURIFICATION EXPLAINED BELOW, CAN BE MODIFIED TO PURIFY BLOOD. 
YES, THIS IS VERY REAL. EBOLA CAN BE CURED AND STOPPED FROM SPREADING BY IMPLEMENTING THIS LIFE SAVING TECHNOLOGY. 
THIS SAME TECHNOLOGY CAN BE USED TO PURIFY AIR AND SURFACES, AS WELL. 
IT IS OFFICIALLY IN YOUR HANDS AT THIS POINT. HOW DO YOU TELL THE WORLD THAT YOU CAN STOP A PANDEMIC DEAD IN IT'S TRACKS?
THANK YOU. BLESSINGS. 
The following is our original campaign, before water took the back seat to this massive EBOLA outbreak. The rest of the campaign explains the water technology. Please IGNORE the $$$ amount being asked for. That was for the original SALTON SEA PROJECT. Whatever resources will be used to make BLOOD PURIFICATION systems. 

We are going to show the world how to restore and protect valuable resources, clean toxic lakes, refill reservoirs, and introduce a first-of-its-kind biomimicry water purification and energy recovery system.

Introducing the GULP CLEAR WATER SYSTEM, for purifying drinking water, contaminated wells, agricultural runoff, waste water, landfill leachate, and sea water.

Our process will set a new benchmark for water quality and alternative energy standards worldwide.


In this campaign we:



Explain the Gulp Clear Water System to the best of our ability

Give examples of the uses for the system 
Give you some AWESOME facts about Gulp Clear Water LLC
Show you how you can get involved in something new and good for you.
Give you a price break-down
Then tell you more about us, our perks we offer, and answers some FAQ

Please check out the full campaign, there is a LOT of information involved.

Remember-- YOU ARE OUR VOICE! Help us PURIFY the WORLD's WATER SUPPLY!





We have had inquiries into more details about the way the GULP system works. We remain somewhat vague about the technology patent that we hold based on several reasons. One of which is that many of the components used in our system are purchased and warranted through other patent holders of specific items. Think of individual pieces that are required to build a car. Each one of these pieces are specially designed for a purpose. We would require that everyone seeing this specific information to sign confidentiality agreements based on our contracts with our suppliers and manufacturers. All components are existing technologies, but we are the only company that holds the technology patent to combine them within one system for the purpose of cleaning water. Due to the liability aspect of confidentiality laws, we are bound by our agreements with our manufacturing partners and license holders to keep some information confidential. None, of the parts of the Gulp System are theoretical, they are all currently being used individually for specialty or commercial purposes. Thank you for your understanding.
THIS IS WHAT WE CAN TELL YOU:
Over the past 8 years, we have been perfecting this technology to bring to the world. Gulp Clear Water has developed a chemical free water purification system capable of removing 99.999% of contaminants out of any water source. 
DO YOU REALIZE WHAT THIS MEANS?!?
Around the world, water is currently cleaned by adding chemicals to burn out the harmful contaminants that are present. The current processes used are proven harmful to humans. With the Gulp Clear Water purification system, people around the world will be able to consume, bath and irrigate with pure, sustainable water.
We are here to set a new standard to combat the Global Water Crisis.

Combining the most cutting edge technology available, the Gulp System:

is configurable to purify up to hundreds of millions of gallons per day 
uses NO chemicals
uses NO reverse osmosis or forward osmosis (the current standard for purification)
uses NO outdated UV technology
uses NO heat
uses NO ozone treatment
renders current desalination obsolete


By utilizing a proprietary and programmable blend of advanced purification media, along with the next generation of germicidal technology, we are able to deliver pure, inexpensive water from any source. 
               
                                                 
This process utilizes both FDA approved technologies and the United States CDC (BAT) Best Available Technologies for water purification. 

With our advanced technologies, we utilize UVC Germicidal LED's for killing microorganisms at the optimal germicidal wavelength, ensuring that even the strongest microorganisms are precisely disassembled at the thiamine base level. This wavelength of light also breaks down chemicals into less harmful sub-components in a process known as Photo-chemical Oxidation. 
All current technology is not even close in efficacy and efficiency.
As amazing as this is, this is only one component of our purification process. 

The result? The following are examples of contaminants removed, but are not limited to:





Fertilizers ex: Nitrates and Phosphates

Pesticides ex: Organophosphates and Carbamates
Pharmaceuticals ex: Antibiotics and Hormones

Heavy Metals ex: Lead and Mercury

Industrial Pollutants ex: Benzene, Hexavalent Chromium, Flouride

Microbial Cysts ex: Cryptosporidium and Giardia

Bacteria ex: E. coli and Legionella (Legionnaires)

Viruses ex: Malaria, West Nile, Ebola
Polychlorinated Biphenyls (PCB's) ex: Dielectric and Coolant Fluids
Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC's) ex: Chlorinated Byproducts and Total Trihalomethanes (TTHM'S) 

Radioactive Isotopes ex: Radium and Strontium

and MORE
With the world’s first fully integrated system of advanced hardware, software, and purification technologies, we are able to offer the template that will combat the global water crisis. 
This is the first and only computational, systematic, precision set of technologies that is completely configurable, scale-able, compatible, and up-gradable. 





Due to the sensitive legal nature of the specific technologies utilized by the Gulp Clear Water System, we are unable to disclose specific proprietary information or labeling of the figure shown above.



﻿The Gulp Clear Water System has been specifically designed with the ability to be deployed as a single mobile unit or an integrated fleet for humanitarian aid or disaster relief. Constructed for easy transport, the system can be calibrated and monitored via satellite anywhere in the world to deliver pure water for proactive solutions and disaster recovery. These systems can be placed on docks or on barges as well, for purification of early onset algae blooms or other pollution inflow to minimize contamination before it has a chance to spread.  



example mobile applications

example mobile applications






Recycling
When the Gulp Clear Water System follows an electrocoagulation unit, which removes the larger debris, even contaminated waste can become the purest drinking water. 
This process can be utilized for drinking water, agriculture, aqua culture, semi conductor grade, or industrial. 
The Gulp Clear Water System revolutionizes water treatment processes, such as treating Leachate (the ground water runoff
from landfills) and Frack water in an environmentally sustainable way, at a fraction of
current cost.  It can also be utilized to purify rain water, greywater, and groundwater for re-use.
In addition, the Gulp Clear Water System is made of 100% recyclable materials.
Municipal
Municipal water supplies and well-water supplies are fighting to stay above drinking water standards across the United States and around the world. By placing Gulp Clear Water Systems within existing municipal water treatment facilities, we will provide a non-chemical, low cost alternative to produce water that exceeds current drinking water standards to every household and business. Whether it is for drinking, bathing, or watering the garden, pure water will be used.
Environmental
Due to severe environmental conditions, several of the world's largest lakes are currently dwindling and more toxic than ever. By implementing the Gulp Clear Water System, even the most contaminated lakes can be restored to their natural, life-giving state.










Keith Ervin, the patent holder for Gulp technology, received the "Early Planning Grant" (EPG) in 2009 from the Wisconsin Entrepreneurs' Network for the Gulp Clear Water purification technology. 
Gulp Clear Water LLC is currently working with one of the world's most advanced Aqua Culture companies to upgrade their current system. 
The world is currently experiencing one of the worst drought and pollution crisis situations in history.
In America, the drinking water standards haven't improved since 1975.
The first Nobel Peace Prize for Physiology or Medicine winner of the 20th century was Niels Ryberg Finsen in 1903 for his cure of Lupus Vulgaris (Tuberculosis Luposa) with Ultra Violet light. 
Agriculture is a major user of ground and surface water in the United States, accounting for approximately 80 percent of the Nation's consumptive water use and over 90 percent in many Western States.

Approximately 780 million people lack access to safe drinking water, that's approximately 1 in 9 people.
3.4 million people die each year as a result of unclean drinking water. That is almost the entire city of Los Angeles.
1 child dies every 21 seconds from a water related disease.
"[The water and sanitation] crisis claims more lives through disease than any war claims through guns." http://water.org/water-crisis/water-facts/water/











We need your support to show the world that there is a solution, an AFFORDABLE solution.

All we need is funding. 
To give you an example of the standard cost of the "most-advanced" UVC purification technology, California recently finished building a $72 million water purification plant that utilizes out-dated UVC technology and power intensive osmosis membranes. We can purify the same amount of water, to a higher quality for a FRACTION of their cost. 

The Price Breakdown: You may be wondering, "Why so much $$$????"

We understand the value of the technology and answers we just gave to the world just by launching this campaign.  
We have changed our campaign. The money no longer matters at this point. We are trying to save as many lives as possible with whatever resources we can accumulate. This means making as many blood purification systems as possible. 
What if we do not get the full funding???
Either way, we will be proceeding with our goal to provide the world with the purest water ever available, whatever that takes.
We have been working closely with our manufacturer, DCR Fabrication, inc. (http://dcrfabinc.com/) Our blue prints are ready. All our components have been waiting in the wings. All the materials are ready to be shipped and assembled, with our team of physicists and engineers excited and ready to give the world this new solution.  
This is where YOU come in. 

We need help. The faster this solution becomes available, the sooner this water quality upgrade will happen and safe, sustainable water WILL be available worldwide.
Utilizing this approach, we can inexpensively deliver pure water to every person and every industry. 
With this inexpensive approach and advanced understanding of our most valuable resource, we are Globally Uniting Lives in Prosperity. 
With pure, sustainable, inexpensive water, everyone wins.
Please spread the word! Every little bit counts. 



For your donations, we will send you awesome perks! 

Bumper Stickers







Coffee Mug






Canvas Tote




Beanie Winter Hat







The Gulp Clear Water T-Shirt 
There may be slight variation in the designs when printed. Please keep this in mind and PLEASE wear our Logo with pride! Not all perks are pictured above. With your donation, you will be bringing the world closer to a HUGE water standard upgrade! A change in the quality of life-- kind of a big deal...






Our mission is to establish a new quality and standard for water purification and conservation through the Gulp Clear Water System.
What started out as a one man show, turned into an amazing partnership, which has since turned into a valuable team of passionate experts. We have invested our hearts and souls into this technology during the most important years of our lives. This technology will change water standards and will change lives. We want to put life back into as many people's hands as possible. The effects pure water will have on the world are endless. 
We truly believe in Globally Uniting Lives in Prosperity by providing pure, sustainable water to as many people and industries as possible. Thank you for your support and we can't wait to see you on the other side of the Salton Sea!


How do I add the extra shipping amount to my donation?
1. Select your Gulp Clear Water Perk Package2. Edit the Dollar Amount to be $5 or $10 for US shipping (depending on the perk), $15 for Canada and $30 for international shipping.3. PurchaseIf the Perk Package had already been purchased:1. Select the perk "International Shipping" or the $10 perk 2. Use the SAME mailing address that you entered when you purchased your original Perk Package3. Purchase
I'm getting a T-shirt as part of my order. Will you be collecting T-shirt sizes?
Yes, we will email you after the campaign to collect your T-shirt size.
How do I share my story if I donated through the "Share YOUR Story" Perk?
We will send you instructions on how to share your story with the world. Your story will be displayed on our website for a long time, probably forever. 
What sizes are available for the Gulp Clear Water System? 
Systems are configurable to accommodate any volume of water from 1 gallon to hundreds of millions of gallons.  
Once the Gulp Clear Water System purifies the water completely, have all the good minerals been taken out as well? 
With all the different uses for the purified water and different industries available, the purification system can be programmed according to customer specifications. For example, drinking water can have additional minerals added as desired.

Sources:
http://www.sbcounty.gov/museum/exhibits/salton/mk%20quick%20facts.pdf
 http://saltonsea.ca.gov/
http://www.ers.usda.gov/topics/farm-practices-management/irrigation-water-use.aspx#.U-jZyPldXW4
http://water.org/water-crisis/water-facts/water/

story:
English version



Hallo und herzlich Willkommen auf meiner Indiegogo Seite.

Mein Name ist Benjamin Baltruschat. Ich bin 33 Jahre alt und lebe in Berlin. Mit 21 Jahren hatte ich einen Sportunfall, bei dem ich mir den fünften Halswirbel gebrochen habe. Seit dem habe ich eine inkomplette Querschnittlähmung und sitze im Rollstuhl.

Doch das will ich ändern!

Nach dem Unfall habe ich schon einiges erreicht. Ich habe eine eigene Wohnung gefunden, meinen Führerschein gemacht, eine Ausbildung zum Mediengestalter erfolgreich abgeschlossen und anschließend einen Arbeitsplatz gefunden. Während dessen habe ich so viel ich konnte trainiert und dadurch viel an Mobilität zurückgewonnen.

Leider wurde mein Antrag an die Rentenkasse, im Rehazentrum in Pforzheim eine Reha zu absolvieren, abgelehnt. Als Begründung wurde ausgeführt, dass kein Belegungsvertrag mit der Einrichtung bestehe. Ich könne daher lediglich in einer Vertragsklinik der Rentenkasse eine Reha-Maßnahme bewilligt bekommen. Die dort angebotene Therapie jedoch, dient nur der Erhaltung und Stabilisierung meines jetzigen Zustands. Um aber eine gravierende Veränderung herbeizuführen, brauche ich eine umfangreichere und zielgerichtete Therapie dergestalt wie sie in Pforzheim angeboten wird.

Ich habe vieles ausprobiert, auch war ich in mehreren Physiotherapiepraxen, bis ich durch einen Artikel in einer Fachzeitschrift auf das „Zentrum der Rehabilitation“ in Pforzheim aufmerksam wurde. Die meisten Patienten dort können durch eine langwierige und intensive Therapie wieder zum Laufen gebracht werden.

Zugegeben, das klingt im ersten Moment vielleicht nach Wunderheiler, ist es aber nicht. Überzeugt Euch einfach selbst.

Zentrum der Rehabilitation

Die Therapie ist zeit- und kostenintensiv, da sie täglich 6-8 Stunden Physiotherapie beinhaltet. In meinem speziellen Fall würden mindestens zwei Therapeuten benötigt, um mich zu mobilisieren. Die Kosten hierfür betragen bei zwei Therapeuten einschließlich Unterkunft in einem Appartement für 30 Tage 22,048 Euro.

Um etwas erreichen zu können, muss ich mindesten 90 Tage in dem Rehazentrum trainieren.

Die Therapie kostet mich daher für den Anfang 66,144 Euro!

Jeder Tag den ich länger dort bleiben kann bedeutet, dass ich meinem Ziel, wieder laufen zu können, ein Stück näher komme.

Um wieder Laufen zu lernen, muss ich „laufen“. Dazu bedarf es vieler intensiver Übungen. Insofern ist auch verständlich, weshalb dieser Arbeitsaufwand so kostenintensiv ist. Der übliche Stundensatz eines Physiotherapeuten für eine Bobath-Behandlung beträgt ca. 58 Euro. Der Stundensatz der Physiotherapeuten in Pforzheim beträgt 60 Euro und hält sich daher im Rahmen des üblichen Stundensatzes. Allein die Intensität macht den Unterschied.

Die Erfolgsaussichten sind jedoch vielversprechend! Nachdem ich in Pforzheim ein Probetraining absolviert habe, glaube ich fest daran, dass ich irgendwann in der Lage sein werde, wieder zu gehen. Wie das aussehen wird, weiß ich nicht. Aber das Erlebnis, im Rahmen des Probetrainings wieder ein Paar Schritte zu gehen, war für mich beeindruckend und bewegend zugleich. Es hat mich aber auch darin bestärkt, weiterzumachen und meinen Traum zu verwirklichen.

Deshalb und dafür brauche ich jede erdenkliche Unterstützung!


Die Spenden werden von der "Stand Up Initiative" verwaltet und können nur zweckgebunden, nämlich für die vorgenannte Therapie, verwendet werden.

Spendenkonto

VR Bank Niebüll
Health Media g.e.V
IBAN Nr.: DE 91217635420027828969
Verwendungszweck: Benjamin


Stand Up Initiative



Unterstützter:
Unlike U Films
Prinz Pi
Beatillz.de
Red Eye FX





English Version


Hi, and welcome to my Indiegogo page.

My name is Benjamin Baltruschat. I'm 33 years old and live in Berlin.

When I was 21, I broke my fifth cervical vertebra in a sports accident; since then I have had incomplete paraplegia and have been in a wheelchair.

But I want to change that!

I've already achieved a lot since the accident. I found a flat of my own, learned to drive, successfully qualified as a media designer and then found a job. At the same time, I trained as much as I could and regained a great deal of mobility.

Unfortunately, my application for rehabilitation at a centre in Pforzheim was turned down by my pension fund, on the grounds that it didn't have an agreement with this facility. I was told that I could only undergo rehabilitation at a clinic with which the pension fund had a contract. However, the therapy provided there is only to maintain and stabilise my current condition. To bring about a significant change in my condition, I need a much more intensive and targeted therapy, of the kind offered in Pforzheim.

I tried a lot of options and visited a lot of physiotherapists before I came across a reference to the "Centre for Rehabilitation" in Pforzheim in a specialist journal. Most of the patients there can, through intensive therapy, regain the ability to walk.

 I realise that might sound like miracle healing, but it's not. Judge for yourself.

Centre for Rehabilitation

The therapy is time-intensive and costly, as it involves 6-8 hours of physiotherapy every day. In my specific case, at least two therapists would be needed to mobilise me. The cost of 30 days of treatment by two therapists, including accommodation in an apartment, is 22,048 euros.

To achieve anything, I need to train at the rehabilitation centre for at least 90 days.

This therapy will therefore cost me a minimum of 66,144 euros!

Every extra day I can spend there means I can come closer to my goal of being able to walk again.

To learn to walk again, I need to "walk". It requires a lot of intensive exercises. That is why the treatment is so expensive. The usual hourly rate for a physiotherapist for Bobath treatment is around 58 euros. The physiotherapists in Pforzheim receive an hourly rate of 60 euros, so their pay falls within the normal range. It's the intensity of the treatment which makes the difference.

However, the chances of success are promising! I've had a trial appointment at Pforzheim, and I'm now convinced that at some point I will be able to walk again. I don't know what it will be like. But the experience of taking a few steps during the trial appointment was both impressive and emotional. And it strengthened my determination to keep going and to make my dream come true.

That is why I need all the support I can get!

Please share on Facebook or Twitter!

Donations are managed by the "Stand Up Initiative".

Stand Up Initiative

Unlike U Films

Red Eye FX

story:
Miracles are possible when you believe :)


Proceeds will help fund Victoria 's medical expenses, travel for surgery and cancer treatments ...Scheduled for Sept 2nd 9am at Princess Margaret Hospital Toronto. 

"As a third time survivor of stage 3C ovarian cancer since 2010 ... I know I will beat the odds and kick cancer's ASS for good! I BELIEVE I have many angels looking out for me ♥. Miracles happen 

Thank you so very much for your positive vibes and prayers." Victoria
We will be posting her journey soon. Victoria is an inspiration and living proof that anyone can survive a terminal diagnosis. Over the last 4 years she has researched and implemented holistic healing methods, exercise, healthy diet, positive affirmations, dance and music therapy to beat cancer twice, and despite what doctors and tests are telling her, she is determined to beat this once again. She is a walking miracle, an inspiration to anyone facing a terminal illness, and the strongest person I have ever met. Please help us keep her alive so she can fulfill her dream of helping others kick cancer's ass! This is such short notice, but the cancer is quite aggressive this time, and we need to to fight back! 
Every little bit helps, and we are so grateful for your donation.
Live, Love, Laugh often :)
Coralee
Love you gypsy soul sister!!

"As a third time survivor of stage 3C ovarian cancer since 2010 ... I know I will beat the odds and kick cancer's ASS for good! I BELIEVE I have many angels looking out for me ♥. Miracles happen 

Thank you so very much for your positive vibes and prayers." VictoriaWe will be posting her journey soon. Victoria is an inspiration and living proof that anyone can survive a terminal diagnosis. Over the last 4 years she has researched and implemented holistic healing methods, exercise, healthy diet, positive affirmations, dance and music therapy to beat cancer twice, and despite what doctors and tests are telling her, she is determined to beat this once again. She is a walking miracle, an inspiration to anyone facing a terminal illness, and the strongest person I have ever met. Please help us keep her alive so she can fulfill her dream of helping others kick cancer's ass! This is such short notice, but the cancer is quite aggressive this time, and we need to to fight back! Every little bit helps, and we are so grateful for your donation.Live, Love, Laugh often :)CoraleeLove you gypsy soul sister!!

story:
The Challenge: Making Kegel Exercise worth It

Pelvic floor fitness is so hot right now. From solid metal Ben Wa balls (made famous by "Fifty Shades of Grey") to squeezable shapes with luxe price tags, kegel exercisers promise stronger vaginas, sexier sex, and all kinds of health benefits. But let's face it: this "sit-and-squeeze" technique is boring, and how do we know it's working? Are we even doing it right?

The Solution: An Affordable High-Tech Kegel Exerciser with Trackable Results

LOOP is not a sex toy - it's a complete fitness system that provides real-time results you can see and feel. LOOP's built-in training programs are based on the principle of contracting and relaxing the pelvic floor muscles (also known as kegels) to build strength, much like lifting weights at the gym: complete a certain number of repetitions for a certain amount of time to build strength and tone muscle. LOOP acts as your personal (and private) trainer and motivates you to make kegels a regular part of your daily routine.

The Benefits of Pelvic Floor Exercise

Regular kegel exercises strengthen the pelvic floor muscles and improve blood circulation in the pelvic area. This can enable stronger muscle contractions during orgasms, as well as increase your ability to react to sexual stimulus. Research has shown that pelvic floor muscle exercises helps prevent or diminish stress incontinence. Doing them can also help you prepare your body for childbirth and recover from it.

How Does LOOP Work?

LOOP connects to your Bluetooth-enabled mobile device via a free app that offers pre-programmed exercise routines and visual feedback you can see with every squeeze. LOOP's high-accuracy pressure sensors detect even the slightest muscle movements and translate them onto your screen into easy-to-read graphics with weekly progress reports that prove it's working!

Why Is LOOP Special?

Ergonomic Shape

LOOP was designed to fit and function with a woman's intimate anatomy. Its asymmetric shape makes it a cinch to insert, comfortable to squeeze, and easy to adjust and twist for a perfect fit.

Universal Design

Unlike most kegel exercisers, LOOP does not vibrate or double as a sex toy. Its slender insertable portion fits easily and securely without the need of external "arm" to keep it in place, making it the most comfortable kegel exerciser ever designed. Completely unique, LOOP opens up its appeal to women (and men) of all lifestyles and comfort levels.

High-Level Accuracy

LOOP's unique pressure-sensitive sensor reacts to every level of pelvic floor muscle movement and motion - from slight to intensely strong - and track them instantly so you can watch your progress on your phone as you're exercising.

Uplifting Experience

The 3-axis accelerometer inside LOOP detects even the slightest motions. It gives you feedback on whether you are "lifting" LOOP with your pelvic floor muscles or not. It's important to differentiate between lifting (correct) and pushing (incorrect) in order to make sure you benefit from the exercise.

Motivational Movement

LOOP's smartphone app leads you through each exercise with instant feedback and lets you choose between personal-training programs or more interactive routines that let you compete against your own best score. Whatever your goal might be, LOOP makes it fun, easy and incredibly accurate.

Instant Exercise

LOOP automatically turns on when you pick it up and connects wirelessly to your phone, which means it's always ready when you are! It's powered by a simple coin cell battery that lasts for up to 1 year, and when it's low on power, the app will tell you it's time to replace it. You can bring LOOP wherever you go, it comes with a discrete pouch made of 100% organic bamboo fabric.


Why Women Love LOOP

"The device fits very comfortably and is really nice to use!"
Anne Siri L., 42 yrs, Oslo, Norway


"I really liked the easy to navigate interface and the simplicity of the exercises, no obstacles, you just get right into it!"
Kajsa W., 35 yrs, 2 children, Stockholm, Sweden


"Love the idea of it, having an app to go with the device makes all the difference!"
Sophia N., 47 yrs, 2 children, Stockholm, Sweden


"Finally a tool that is cool and fun enough to motivate healthy women to do pelvic floor muscle training as a daily routine. A completely new approach to help preventing pelvic floor disorders and to make you aware of your body which affects almost every part of your life, including sex."
Dr. Orsolya Olah, MD, Obstetrician and Gynecologist


Materials & Safety

LOOP will be made to meet the highest quality and safety standards to ensure all materials and components are body-safe. It's going to be manufactured in accordance with the Medical Device Directive 93/42/EEC at an ISO13485 certified facility.

Specifications

Total length: 10.5cm/4.1in
Length of insertable part: 7cm/2.75 in
Diameter at widest section: 3cm/1.18inch
Materials: Body-safe silicone, ABS
Connectivity: Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) with 10m/30feet range
Sensors: MEMS pressure sensor, 3-axis accelerometer
Battery: CR2032 (standard, replaceable coin cell battery)
Battery life: Up to 1 year
Waterproof: Down to 1m

About the Pelvic Floor

The pelvic floor forms the base of the group of muscles commonly called the "core". It is a series of muscles that are tightly slung between the tailbone (coccyx) and the pubic bone and support healthy bowel, bladder, uterus and vaginal function. Squeeze and hold as though you're trying not to pee - that's your pelvic floor working!

Why Do I Need to Exercise My Pelvic Floor Muscles?

A strong pelvic floor is able to contract, lift and hold in order to do it's job. Strong pelvic floor muscles can also promote deeper, more powerful orgasms and a noticeable feeling of "tightness" during sex. When these muscles become weak, you might experience one or more of the following concerns:

  • Accidentally leaking urine when you laugh, cough or sneeze
  • Accidental flatulence
  • Difficulty emptying your bladder or bowels
  • Lower back or pelvic pain

What Can Cause Pelvic Floor Weakness?

  • Pregnancy and vaginal childbirth
  • Heavy lifting
  • Aging/growing older
  • Being overweight
  • Chronic constipation or straining to empty the bowels
  • Chronic coughing or sneezing

What Led To LOOP?

Doctors, nurses and therapists around the world have been studying pelvic floor health for decades, experimenting with and exploring new ways to combat and alleviate pelvic floor problems. Now, national health organizations in most countries recommend that women exercise their pelvic floor muscles every day to maintain optimal intimate health - yet still, so many women don't do it. With this awareness, we wanted to create a kegel exerciser unlike anything else on the market that would make it fun, easy and exciting to keep the pelvic floor in tip-top shape.

Why Us? The Team Behind LOOP

We have worked in the intimate health research and manufacturing fields for years and designed award winning products. Inspired by personal experience, we combined our unique expertise to create this groundbreaking device.


Line Andersen & Karianne Rønning Ellekrans

Line and Karianne develop intimate wellness products for women, specializing in ergonomic and functional design suited for the female body. Over the last few years, the duo has focused their studies and strategy around solutions to common sexual and intimate issues, including pelvic floor weakness, and created a series of body-safe and female-friendly products that provide fantastic benefits. As women in their 30s and 40s, Line and Karianne know firsthand how important it is to make pelvic floor fitness a daily habit and they can't wait to help other women get into their own kegel routines!

Anders Guldahl & Adam Scheuring

Anders and Adam develop hardware and software for fitness electronics and applications that measure and track physical activities with precision and accuracy. Researching how to apply this kind of technology to men's and women's overall health, the two came across medical sensors commonly used in physical therapy offices - but too complicated for the average person to use. They got to work to create a user-friendly version of this important device that could be used for pelvic floor exercise and ultimately improve women's quality of life. The result is the unique technology used in LOOP.

Be Part of Bringing LOOP To Women Around the World!

We have fully functional samples of LOOP that have been tested and reviewed by a wide range of users, and the final design is ready for production. However, we are a small company with limited capacity and can only finance production of a modest number of units.

With your pledge, we can increase our production numbers and speed up the process to put LOOP in the hands of women around the world. By introducing LOOP to the marketplace, its ease of use and reasonable price will inspire more women to make kegel exercise part of their daily routine. Every contribution will help to turn our passion for promoting intimate health into exciting reality and introduce superior (and fun!) kegel fitness to women of all ages and lifestyles.


Production Timeline

Risks & Challenges

We have selected a manufacturer that we previously worked with on several different products. We know what the next steps are for preparing the production and seeing it all through. It is a complex process and we may encounter challenges along the way that need further solving. Should these challenges arise we will communicate it with you via updates here on Indiegogo.

Frequently Asked Questions

1. When will I receive my LOOP?

We will do our utmost to have your LOOP shipping in May 2015 so you receive it in June. We will provide continuous updates about the production schedule after the campaign has finished.

2. Where do you ship to?

We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere they deliver.

3. Is shipping included?

Shipping is $10 (worldwide flat rate). Please add this to the amount of your pledge to cover the cost of shipping. Backers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries.

4. Is there a warranty for LOOP?

Yes, LOOP comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

5. Which phones will work with LOOP?

At launch LOOP will work with iOS and Android phones that support Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). So at this time you need an iPhone 4S or newer, iPod Touch 5, iPad 3 or newer, or a modern Android phone with BLE support such as the Samsung Galaxy S4, S5. Please verify with your product provider that your particular device has Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) support.

  • iPhone 4s/5/5c/5s/6/6 Plus
  • iPod touch 5
  • iPad 3/4/Air/mini
  • Samsung Galaxy S4/S5/Note 3/4
  • Google Nexus 4/5
  • Android 4.3/4.4/5 devices with BLE

We are focused on providing the best possible experience for mobile applications right now. We will share a full list of compatible devices closer to our release date.

6. What's in the box?

LOOP will arrive beautifully packaged with the following inside:

  1. LOOP sensor
  2. CR2032 coin cell battery
  3. Protective pouch made of 100% organic bamboo fabric
  4. Instruction manual

By the time of launch, the LOOP app will be available in App Store and Google Play.

7. Who can use LOOP?

Generally speaking all women. The exception would be the first weeks after childbirth or if you have a condition that may require specific treatment other than/or prevents you from doing pelvic floor exercise and/or inserting LOOP into your vagina.

8. Will it come in only one colour?

Initially LOOP will come in one colour as shown here on Indiegogo.

9. How do I know when to replace the battery?

The LOOP app will let you know when the battery is almost depleted.

10. Where can I get a replacement battery?

The battery is the most commonly available coin cell battery (CR2032) that costs less than $2. You can buy it in any grocery store, pharmacy, consumer electronics shop or online store such as Amazon - places where you regularly buy batteries.

11. Is the wireless communication safe to use?

The wireless communication is based on Bluetooth LE and is 100% safe. It is a thousand times less powerful than WiFi or the cellular network communication of your phone.

12. How long will I be able to use it?

If used as directed, LOOP should last for many years.

13. Will it help me experience orgasm?

LOOP first and foremost can help you get a stronger pelvic floor. A stronger pelvic floor can enable stronger contractions during orgasms, as well as increase blood flow in your pelvis which again can increase your ability to react to sexual stimulus.

14. Will it help prevent bladder problems?

LOOP is designed to help you exercise your pelvic floor correctly and regularly. If you exercise your pelvic floor muscles regularly and properly, you will strengthen the muscles or maintain their strength. A stronger pelvic floor can increase continence.

15. Will it help with lower back problems?

Lower back problems may have various causes. Exercising your pelvic floor, with or without LOOP may not have any impact on lower back problems. But when lower back problems are a result of a weak pelvic floor, certainly strengthening the pelvic floor muscles could have a positive impact.

16. What is it made of?

LOOP's surface is made of body-safe silicone which means it is phthalate-free, non-porous and hypo allergenic.

17. How do I clean it?

LOOP is 100% watertight so it is easy to clean, simply use warm water and regular soap.

story: Hi everyone,I am 28 years old and got Lyme disease when i was 21 when i was bitten by an ufornately infectious tick, this has been very hard and has not been easier since i was already disabled with a musle and joint syndrom i had since birth called Ehler-Danlos syndrom, my biggest dream is to get rid of the lyme disease so i can get some of my lifequality back and in Germany they have the treatment and medicines for it,many people have gotten healthy after they have gotten treatment there.But its expensive and i live on disability and can`t afford it, there isn`t any treatment in norway. Please help me those who can, i will be so gratefull for your help. Lyme disease is a disease which brings alot of pain and breakes down the body.Many ends up in wheelchairs whitout treatment.The money i get in i will use on travelling to germany, and to pay for the medicines(the cure),and that will cost around 25.000 . Hoping for the best, Simon. Every dollar you donate will make a difference and will be grately appreciated. My best regards Simon

story:
Short Summary

Shadowvest seeks to become the first mobile and concealable exercise device for consumers, personal trainers and physical therapists who are looking to improve the quality of their lives as well as the lives of their patients/clients.
ShadowVest was designed by Brian Sniffen. Brian possesses a Master's degree in Biology, two NASM certifications in exercise physiology: a personal training and mixed martial arts conditioning and a certification in FMS (functional movement system, which was designed by renowned physical therapist Gray Cooke and Dr. Lee Burton).

What We Need:

Currently, 10,000 dollars of contribution money is required to begin the initial marketing phase.
The contributions made will go to:
 Creating awareness for this product, so people can possess an alternative option to staying healthy. Examples: social media outlets, outdoor events, fitness trade shows, etc. An infomercial demonstrating the benefits will also help in conveying the message.
Educating physical therapists and personal trainers on how this product can be used in conjunction with normal and rehabilitative exercises. Just like creating awareness there are outdoor events such as marathons, 5k and 10k events, walk for breast cancer, etc, which would be nice venues to demonstrate and educate.
Creating further embellishments to this product as needed to better serve a wide range of individual needs. Example: proper fitting for size differences, bands with better adjustability to progress individuals.

The Impact

As a personal trainer, I've realized the main reason why most people don't exercise and that is a lack of time. For example, household demands prioritize a parents life and often enough, parents will sacrifice their own needs for the needs of their children. This sacrifice in most situations, usually is at the expense of the parents health because they don't have time to invest in taking care of themselves.
What the Shadowvest is designed to do is help individuals find time to strengthen muscles and burn calories. A person can wear the vest and continue to go about their day, shopping for the family, cleaning the house, taking the kids to the park or the dog for a walk all while benefitting from the additional resistance the product has to offer. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with this product is educating people on how to use a technical device for improving health. My experiences as a college professor have helped me find ways to educate people on subject matters. My experiences as a personal trainer have helped me instill in my clients the practical understandings of exercise and proper movement techniques. Through video illustrations, pictures, basic interaction with people and my past experiences, I'm able to create that understanding and prove the benefit of the shadowvest.

Any contribution would be greatly appreciated and I understand not everyone can contribute money to a cause. Just helping to spread the word about this new product can greatly increase it's chances of becoming well known. Putting my website link www.shadowvest.com on a Facebook or Twitter page would be a great contribution to me as I continue to make this transition into the marketing world. 
I thank you for taking the time to learn about my campaign and my quest to tackle health related illnesses.

Educating physical therapists and personal trainers on how this product can be used in conjunction with normal and rehabilitative exercises. Just like creating awareness there are outdoor events such as marathons, 5k and 10k events, walk for breast cancer, etc, which would be nice venues to demonstrate and educate.
Creating further embellishments to this product as needed to better serve a wide range of individual needs. Example: proper fitting for size differences, bands with better adjustability to progress individuals.
  The Impact
As a personal trainer, I've realized the main reason why most people don't exercise and that is a lack of time. For example, household demands prioritize a parents life and often enough, parents will sacrifice their own needs for the needs of their children. This sacrifice in most situations, usually is at the expense of the parents health because they don't have time to invest in taking care of themselves.
What the Shadowvest is designed to do is help individuals find time to strengthen muscles and burn calories. A person can wear the vest and continue to go about their day, shopping for the family, cleaning the house, taking the kids to the park or the dog for a walk all while benefitting from the additional resistance the product has to offer. 
Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with this product is educating people on how to use a technical device for improving health. My experiences as a college professor have helped me find ways to educate people on subject matters. My experiences as a personal trainer have helped me instill in my clients the practical understandings of exercise and proper movement techniques. Through video illustrations, pictures, basic interaction with people and my past experiences, I'm able to create that understanding and prove the benefit of the shadowvest.

Any contribution would be greatly appreciated and I understand not everyone can contribute money to a cause. Just helping to spread the word about this new product can greatly increase it's chances of becoming well known. Putting my website link www.shadowvest.com on a Facebook or Twitter page would be a great contribution to me as I continue to make this transition into the marketing world. 
I thank you for taking the time to learn about my campaign and my quest to tackle health related illnesses.
campaign_city: Upper New York City Area, United States

story:
Help turn a tragedy into something amazing

Chris Williams may lose the use of his hand due to a renovation accident.

Chris is a Toronto musician, bike mechanic, landlord, and actor. As an active member of the Burningman community for many years he's used his amazing hands to build, modify, and contribute to numerous large scale art pieces. From his own two way facing bicycle, to the immense Heart Machine and more, Chris is a selfless guy with the greatest smile. Can't afford a bike? He's given many away. Now he may never fix another bike again.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise funds for him to stay afloat and not be crushed by this terrible accident.  We're all chipping in to help out so check our perks for a variety of rewards!


The Impact

If Chris can't work he can't pay his mortgage and he loses his home for him, his partner, and his new baby.  This would be crushing on top of the damage to his hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign around. Donate services for perks. Send Chris your love.

Help us reach the stretch goals!!

The Stretch goals are built to give Chris and Stephanie the tools to overcome this difficulty and flourish. Raising $1000 is only a little bit, we can raise more. Much more. The perks are worth ever dollar. We can choose between softening the blow, neutralizing the effect, or completely swinging it into the positive.

$5000 - for advanced support and recovery

Additional buffer for the difficult times and additional rehab for Chris.

$8,000 - Cloth Feed and Support the Baby

With the new born about to arrive there will be a new life to take care of. 

$10,000

Crush the creditors. We all have expenses and debts. Times will be difficult paying the mortgage and we want to crush the bills before they get too strong.



A List of Perk Providers

Photographers
Sarah Super
https://www.flickr.com/photos/63002911@N00/
Andrew Miller
www.zephn.com

Chefs
Jagger Gordon

Fire Performers
Andrew Miller
Dan Muirhead

Pottery
Sarah Dobbins

story:
MEET PAVLOK

The Habit Changing Device That Shocks You.

Break bad habits, weaken cravings, and train your reptile brain through  vibration, beep, and electric shock.

You CAN STILL Get a Pavlok

December promo: Get a HUGE discount. Order a prototype or pre-order from http://pavlok.com



"Wake up sleepy head... it's time to go to the gym." "Put down those chips!" "Stop wasting time on Facebook."

If any of the above statements and more resonate with you, then you're not alone. Pavlok is here to help you unlock your true potential.


PAVLOK REFUNDS AND FREE E-BOOK

Earn refunds through our Thank You Program and download our e-book to help change your habits.


PAVLOK THANK YOU PROGRAM

Earn $25 Refunds & Get Pavlok For Free

CLICK HERE FOR DETAILS


HABIT CHANGE E-BOOK

We've created a special e-book to help you change your habits.

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD IT FOR FREE BY PAYING WITH A SHARE


HOW PAVLOK HELPS

Pavlok adds accountability and electric shock to change what you do.


It is the first device that helps you form good habits, break bad habits, and stick to your commitments, using any means necessary. 

Pavlok starts with punishment for bad behavior, and moves to positive feedback for good behavior over time.


THE EXPERTS LOVE PAVLOK

Don't take our word for it, check out what the experts are saying.


Pavlok in the press montage


YAHOO! takes Pavlok for a test

CLICK HERE TO SEE THE FULL REVIEW


HOW PAVLOK WORKS

By combining positive and negative reinforcement.


Pavlok combines accurate tracking, commitment techniques, and 'on-your-wrist' reminder triggers to change users' brains and form the habits they wish they had.




Pavlok is easy to get started.



Choose your daily habit

Pick your action. Exercise every day, be more productive online, learn a new language, wake up earlier — the possibilities are endless!

In the Pavlok app, choose what you want to accomplish. Pavlok will break your goal down into easy, manageable actions. Each day, Pavlok will push you to stay on track and form the lasting habit.


Real Accountability, Real Results

Willpower isn't enough. Habit change requires accountability. You won't have to make the journey alone - Pavlok helps you find a partner or join a team of your friends.

Social support and pressure will keep you on track. When you hit a bump in the road, they'll motivate you to keep going. Or, they'll punish you.


Earn Rewards and Face Penalties

Choose your level of commitment. Pavlok can reward you when you achieve your goals. Earn prizes and even money when you complete your daily task.

But be warned: if you fail, you’ll face penalties. Pay a fine, lose access to your phone, or even suffer an electric shock…at the hands of your friends.


Make a change that lasts.

Research shows that consistency is the key to forming a habit. When you use Pavlok to stick to your goals, you'll find that they become easier and eventually, automatic.

At that point, use Pavlok to train your next habit and keep up your transformation into a better you.


PAVLOK CHANGES HABITS

You can use Pavlok to change all sorts of behaviors.


Form new habits


Wake up early

What would you do with just one extra hour of time each day? Would you start a business, explore your creativity, or just have some “me” time? The opportunities are endless. But it’s so easy to hit “snooze” and roll over.

Pavlok: Wake Up lets you set an alarm to gently vibrate and wake you up. But, what if you keep hitting the snooze button? Pavlok can deliver just enough of a “jolt” to get you up and running --- with adrenaline.


Get In Shape, Stay In Shape

Do you have any friends who run or lift every day but complain when they miss a day? They simply have developed the habit of exercise. For them, it actually requires willpower to NOT work out. 

With two months of daily activity, you’d feel exactly the same. This might sound crazy, but it’s been scientifically validated. 

Pavlok Fit uses a powerful commitment ecosystem to help your form this habit. Choose between hitting the gym (measured by GPS), walking 10,000 steps, or running with Runkeeper. Earn rewards when you succeed to keep you motivated.

Choose your commitment level, and when you succeed, you’ll earn money. But, if you fail, you’ll have a penalty to your Facebook friends. Either you’ll give them your money --- or they’ll get to shock you.


Break bad habits


Conquer Distractions, Be More Productive

Pavlok Productive retrains your deeply ingrained “chronic web surfing” habits. In our trial research, we found that a large number of participants have significant trouble getting work done in the face of temptation (e.g. incoming emails, interesting articles, status updates).

The Pavlok app and wristband track your surfing habits. Using a combination of vibration, sound, and electric shock, the wristband stops distractions in their tracks and keeps you focused on your work.

How much would you get done if you stopped wasting time on social media and constantly checking your email? Pavlok can break the bad habit of opening too many tabs and mindlessly wasting your day.

EXPAND PAVLOK WITH IFTT

Different people want to change different behaviors.


We plan to integrate with ifttt.com, a website that connects different products with different APIs.  


Here are examples of some potential integration's.

  • Shock you when you text your ex-lover.
  • Remind you to take your medicine, and connect to a smart Pill bottle to prove compliance
  • Beep loudly any time you step inside of a McDonald's.
  • Improve your golf swing or powerlifting technique using other wearable sensors and our scalable vibration motor.
  • Help you meditate by having you commit to a training app.
  • Integrate with smart EEG brain devices to train and get feedback on your mental states.
  • Use Pavlok to remind you to eat more protein or walk more steps.
  • Ensure that you get up from your computer every hour to stretch.
  • Train and remind you not to go on distracting websites in real-time.


RESULTS SPEAK FOR THEMSELVES

See what real people are saying about Pavlok


David Goldstien

Watch how David Goldstein lost 7 lbs after a stroke and after a heart attack.

Heather O.

Heather used Pavlok to invigorate her habit of Painting.

Justine D.

Habit: Wake Up An Hour Earlier

Now I get up at 7 without pressing the snooze button, do 10 mins of mindfulness meditation, read a few pages of a philosophical or poetry book, and write. These are all habits now!

Daniel D.

Habit: Write 1000 words each day

I’ve been able to write 1,000 words per day consistently. No matter how hard I've tried in the past, it was impossible. But the program really works. The best part is, now the habit doesn't feel like a chore...it's just part of my life.


PAVLOK WORKS YOUR CURRENT APPS

Work seamlessly with apps that you are already using.


Don't worry about tracking everything separately, we'll do the hard part for you. 

All you have to do is decide what habit you want to tackle and we'll make sure that you achieve your goals! (Thanks to Beeminder for helping us)


THE STORY BEHIND PAVLOK

Hi! I'm Maneesh Sethi. A few years ago, I  hired a girl to slap me in the face whenever I used  Facebook. My productivity increased 4x --- so I knew I was on to something.

A few weeks later, I asked my friend Dan Kaminsky if we could build a shock collar that shocked me when I went on Facebook. Dan said: Let's go to RadioShack.

So we built a prototype, and I was fortunate that an incubator in Boston, Bolt, decided to invest. They then introduced me to my co-founder, Jim Lynch --- the original inventor of LEGO Mindstorms and the senior engineer on the Roomba Floor Cleaning Robot.

Below, you can see the change in size --- from November 2010, all the way to our smallest quartersize module.


Timeline

October: Make lots of friends on IndieGoGo.

November: Finalize the engineering of Pavlok and place the tooling orders.

December: Build-out tooling and procure raw materials and components.

January: Ramp up mass manufacturing, pilot the production process, and perform quality assurance on product.

February: Begin mass manfacturing for our Pavlok community.

March: Complete the assembly and prepare for shipment.

April: BEGIN SHIPPING!!!! HOORAY!!!


THE PAVLOK TEAM

Maneesh Sethi ran the Web site Hack the System but noticed his waning productivity. After having to resort to tricks to keep himself writing -- most notably, hiring someone to slap him in the face whenever he used Facebook --- Maneesh had the idea to build technology to improve productivity.

Maneesh studied at Stanford University, has written four programming books (including an international bestseller), and helped launch numerous New York Times Bestsellers (such as The 4- Hour Chef by Tim Ferriss). You can read more about him at http://hackthesystem.com/about

Jim Lynch is accomplished Electrical Engineer and passionate inventor. He has delivered some of world’s most life changing products in the robotics, medical and educational fields. At iRobot, Jim served as the Senior Lead Electrical Engineer on products such as the Roomba floor-cleaning robot and My Real Baby. Jim’s experience includes inventing the world-changing LEGO Mindstorms, walking Velociraptors at Hasbro, and the Looj Gutter Cleaning Robot at iRobot.

Jim understands the user and strives to produce products that provide an emotional experience and enrich people’s lives. A veteran in robust, low cost design,  Jim can balance needs and expectations with solid practical design. A master at embedded systems, sensor technologies and far-east manufacturing, Jim’s skill set can be summarized in just a few words: Jim delivers great products.

Chris Schelzi is our Jack of All Trades when it comes to strategy, marketing, and growth hacking. He's experienced in building brands that connect with users. Chris loves exploring the fringes and finding unique methods for making idea’s stick. He’s always looking for the next challenge to push his limits, physically and mentally. Chris is rarely found without a book in hand and has an odd affinity for slathering butter on everything.

Justus Eapen is a software engineer obsessed with sexy code and healthy habits (and vice versa). He's a black belt in the dark arts of the stir fry and has been known to write killer bios in the third person. He loves sustainable farming and hip hop music. His name is a sentence, rendering it instantly memorable: Just use a pen!

Nicole Fallek is our rockstar designer who's the mastermind behind our fantastic graphics and photography. Her unique style and personality shines through in her work and makes her a truly invaluable member of the team. 

Adam Andrewjeski is a software engineer who likes hacking drones and taking them on long flights on the beach. He’s fascinated with cryptocurrencies, the dark web, and cyber security. You’ll probably find him reading up on personal development or blogging about his exploits with Swift and other languages at adamandrewjeski.com

Peter Dunbar is a former consultant turned Software Engineer with a passion for all things mobile and embedded. Peter’s addiction to problem solving has led him on a mission to bridge the gaps between the worlds of software and hardware. If you can’t find him working on our firmware, he’s probably off habit hacking in Ruby and Objective C.

Sasha Iuleu is a hardware superhero. He's managed to shrink the size of the Pavlok device considerably, making it discrete and easy to wear everyday. Sasha is responsible for the heart of Pavlok, the module. We're lucky to have such a hardworking and innovative thinker on our hardware team.


Where We Are

Pavlok is not just an idea. Pavlok has already begun shipping developer prototypes. Over 350 people have used the Pavlok app or system to form new habits.

We’ve utilized cutting edge 3D printing and electronics technology to bring you the most impactful behavioral change product to make a difference in your life.

With your support, we can bring behavioral change through the Pavlok worldwide. Your contribution will help fund:

  • Developing more awesome features!
  • Production
  • Fulfillment


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Is the shock safe?

Absolutely! The circuit is complete on your skin, and the voltage / amperage is not enough to hurt you. It is a very noticeable shock --- like a static shock like when you walk with your socks on a rug and then touch a metal door knob.

Will Pavlok work on my Android and iOS?

Yes! We are developing both Android and iOS versions.

My mom thinks you guys are crazy.

Well that's not really a question but we understand, our moms think we're a little nuts as well but they love us anyway :)  

Are there other options besides shocking?

Beeping, vibrating, monetary penalties, and posting on your social network like Facebook. You choose what method motivates you the most. 

Do you offer a warranty?

Yes, Pavlok is has a one-year manufacturer warranty!

How long does the battery last?

Pavlok can deliver up to 200 shocks on a single charge. That means that for the typical user Pavlok will last 4 days on a full charge. 

What stops you from taking it off?

Pavlok knows when it's on you --- the human detect is an important component. If you're late to the gym, you get vibrated and shocked. But if you've made a real commitment, and you're not wearing the wristband --- you get charged money. Real commitment comes from real accountability.

Are there different size wristbands?

The wristband is adjustable, so it will fit you for sure :).

How do you control how much it shocks you?

You can adjust the intensity of the shock inside the app.

How do you charge it?

Pavlok charges through a Micro-USB cable which will be provided along with the device.

Can my device be controlled by someone else's phone?

If you give them permission to! But no, someone can't steal control of your device without your consent.

How much range does the device have with my phone?

The range of Bluetooth, which can be 40-60 feet.

Is the shock momentary or continuous?

Momentary.

How heavy is it?

It's very light --- a few ounces.

Is it difficult to set up?

Super easy! No previous rocket or scientist degree's required.

What kind of data does the app store about me?

At the moment, the app is not storing any data, but is using your current actions to deliver feedback.

How tight should the device fit?

Very snug to the skin to maintain constant contact to your skin.

Is it waterproof?

You can't swim in it, but we are working on making it highly water resistant.

What habits can I break with Pavlok?

Pavlok is designed to help to break ANY habit. This ranges from visiting distracting websites, going to fast food restaurants, not standing up from your desk often enough, going to bed late, biting your nails, and TONS of others. 

Do I have to wear Pavlok everyday in order to reap the benefits?

No! Research has shown that it can take as little as 30 days to break a habit. While some stubbornly ingrained habits can take up to 66 days, habits like flossing or going to bed on time can be achieved in less than 2 weeks! After you've formed a habit with Pavlok you no longer need to wear it everyday, unless you have a different habit that you are trying to make or break. And if you ever start to fall off track with one of your habits all you have to do is put Pavlok back on for a few days to correct yourself!

Are you guys the most awesome company ever?

Well it's very nice of you to ask :) We pride ourselves on our ability to give our supporters a truly unique device unlike anything they've ever had before and to give them the means to become the person they always knew they could become. Any awesomeness that we have is directly linked to the awesomeness of our supporters!

How does Pavlok know if I've completed the task?

Pavlok is paired with your phone using Bluetooth, and we use a variety of APIs to allow you to set goals you can't cheat. GPS will confirm if you're at the gym, for example.

Don't see your question above?

Shoot us an email at team@pavlok.com and one of us will get back to you quicker than a camel drinks a coke!
